Nganhliziyonye bawakha amacebo ndawonye; bayahlangana beme ndawonye ukumelana lawe,
amathente ase-Edomi lama-Ishumayeli, awamaMowabi lawamaHagari,
amaGebhali, lama-Amoni lama-Amaleki, amaFilistiya labantu beThire.
Lama-Asiriya asebambene labo ukuqinisa izizukulwane zikaLothi.
Yenza kubo njengoba wenza eMidiyani, njengowakwenza kuSisera loJabhini emfuleni iKhishoni,
ababhubha e-Endo baba njengezibi emhlabathini.
Yenza izikhulu zabo zibe njengo-Orebhi loZebhi, wonke amakhosana abo abe njengoZebha loZalimuna,
abathi, “Kasiwathumbe amadlelo kaNkulunkulu.”
Benze babe njengenkunkuma, Oh Nkulunkulu wami, njengamakhoba ephetshulwa ngumoya.
Njengalokhu umlilo uhangula igusu kumbe ilangabi lilumathisa izintaba,
kanjalo basukele ngesivunguvungu sakho ubethuse ngesiphepho sakho.
Bahuqe ubuso babo ngehlazo ukuze abantu balidinge ibizo lakho, Oh Thixo.
Sengathi bangayangeka lanini badunyazwe; kungathi bangafa belehlazo.
Yenza bakwazi ukuthi wena, obizo lakho unguThixo ukuthi wena wedwa ungoPhezukonke emhlabeni wonke.

Yeka ubuhle bendlu yakho, Oh Thixo Somandla!
Umphefumulo wami uyalangazela, uze ungathi uyaphela, ngifuna amaguma kaThixo; inhliziyo yami lenyama yami kukhalela uNkulunkulu ophilayo.
Intaka layo ilizuzile ikhaya, lenkonjane isidleke sayo, lapho ingazalela khona abantwana bayo indawo eduze kwe-alithari lakho, Oh Thixo Somandla, Nkosi yami loNkulunkulu wami.
Babusisiwe labo abahlala endlini yakho; bahlala bekudumisa kokuphela.
Babusisiwe labo abalamandla abo akuwe asebebeke inhliziyo zabo ekulagiseni kuwe.
Bathi nxa bedabula esiGodini seBhaka basenze sibe yindawo yemithombo; izulu lekwindla lalo ligcwalise iziziba.
Ayakhula amandla abo ande, ngulowo lalowo aze aqhamuke kuNkulunkulu eZiyoni.
Zwana umkhuleko wami, Oh Thixo Nkulunkulu Somandla; akungilalele, Oh Nkulunkulu kaJakhobe.
Khangela isihlangu sethu, Oh Nkulunkulu; khangela ngomusa kogcotshiweyo wakho.
Lungcono usuku olulodwa emagumeni akho kulensuku eziyinkulungwane kwenye indawo; kungabangcono ngibe ngumlindimasango endlini kaNkulunkulu kulokuhlala emathenteni ababi.
Ngoba uThixo ulilanga lesihlangu; uThixo uyapha umusa lodumo; kancitshani langaluphi ulutho oluhle kulabo ozinyathelo zabo zingelansolo.
Oh Thixo Somandla, ubusisiwe umuntu owethemba kuwe.

Ulithandile ilizwe lakho, Oh Thixo; uyibuyisile inhlanhla kaJakhobe.
Wazithethelela iziphambeko zabantu bakho wazisibekela zonke izono zabo.
Walubuyisela eceleni lonke ulaka lwakho wakufulathela ukuthukuthela kwakho okwesabekayo.
Sivuselele njalo, Oh Nkulunkulu Msindisi wethu, ukubeke khatshana ukukucunula kwethu.
Uzasizondela kuze kube phakade na? Uzalugcina ulaka lwakho kuzozonke izizukulwane na?
Kawuzukusivuselela na, ukuze abantu bakho bathokoze kuwe?
Sitshengise uthando lwakho olungaphuthiyo, Oh Thixo, usinike insindiso yakho.
Ngizalalela lokho uNkulunkulu uThixo azakutsho; uthembisa abantu bakhe ukuthula, abangcwele bakhe kodwa kabangabuyeli ebufebeni babo.
Ngempela insindiso iseduze kulabo abamesabayo, ukuze inkazimulo yakhe ihlale elizweni lethu.
Uthando lokuthembeka kuyahlangana ndawonye; ukulunga lokuthula kuyangana.
Ukuthembeka kuqhamuka emhlabathini, ukulunga kukhanya phansi kusezulwini.
Ngeqiniso uThixo uzanika okulungileyo, lelizwe lethu lizathela isivuno salo.
Ukulunga kuhamba phambi kwakhe kulungisele izinyathelo zakhe indlela.

Zwana, Oh Thixo, ungiphendule, ngoba ngingumyanga ngiyaswela.
Vikela impilo yami, ngoba ngizinikele kuwe; sindisa inceku yakho ekuthembayo; UnguNkulunkulu wami.
Woba lesihawu kimi, Oh Thixo, ngoba ngitshona ngikubiza ilanga lonke.
Letha ukuthokoza encekwini yakho, ngoba kuwe, Oh Thixo, ngiphakamisela umphefumulo wami.
Uyathethelela njalo ulungile, Oh Thixo, ugcwele uthando kulabo abakhuleka kuwe.
Zwana umkhuleko wami, Oh Thixo; lalela ukukhala kwami ngicela umusa.
Mhla ngiphakathi kokuhlupheka ngizakhala kuwe, ngoba uzangiphendula.
Phakathi kwabonkulunkulu kakho onjengawe, Oh Thixo; kakulazenzo ezingalinganiswa lezakho.
Zonke izizwe owazenzayo zizakuza zikhonze kuwe, Nkosi; zizaletha udumo ebizweni lakho.
Ngoba umkhulu njalo wenza imisebenzi emangalisayo; wena wedwa unguNkulunkulu.
Ngifundisa indlela yakho, Oh Thixo, ukuze ngihambe eqinisweni lakho; ngipha inhliziyo engaxamalazanga, ukuze ngilesabe ibizo lakho.
Ngizakudumisa, Nkosi Nkulunkulu wami, ngenhliziyo yami yonke; ngizalidumisa ibizo lakho laphakade.
Ngoba lukhulu uthando lwakho kimi; ungenyule ekujuleni kwendawo yabafileyo.
Iziqholo ziyangihlasela, Oh Nkulunkulu iqembu lamadoda alesihluku lizingela impilo yami abantu abangakunanziyo wena.
Kodwa wena, Nkosi, unguNkulunkulu olozwelo, olobubelo, ophuza ukuzonda, owandayo ngothando lokuthembeka.
Phendukela ngakimi ube lesihawu kimi; veza amandla akho ngenceku yakho, ngisindise ngoba ngiyakukhonza, njengokwenziwa ngumama.
Ngipha isiboniso sokulunga kwakho, ukuze izitha zami zisibone ziyangeke, ngoba wena, Oh Thixo, usungisizile njalo wangiduduza.
Usakhile isisekelo sakhe entabeni engcwele;
uThixo uyawathanda amasango eZiyoni okudlula yonke imizi kaJakhobe.
Izinto ezinhle okumangalisayo ziyatshiwo ngawe, we muzi kaNkulunkulu:
“Ngizabalisa uRahabi leBhabhiloni phakathi kwalabo abathi bayangazi iFilistiya leThire, kanye leKhushi ngibe sengisithi, ‘Lo wazalelwa eZiyoni.’ ”
Ngempela kuzathiwa ngeZiyoni, “Lo laloyana bazalelwa khona, kuthi yena oPhezukonke uzaliqinisa.”
UThixo uzaloba eluhlwini lwamabizo abantu: “Lo wazalelwa eZiyoni.”
Bazakuthi betshaya amachacho bahlabele bathi, “Yonke imithombo yami ikuwe.”
Oh Thixo, Nkulunkulu ongisindisayo, ebusuku lemini ngikhala kuwe.
Akuthi umkhuleko wami ufinyelele kuwe; phendula indlebe yakho izwe ukukhala kwami.
Ngoba umphefumulo wami ugcwele inhlupheko lempilo yami isilengela engcwabeni.
Ngibalwa ndawonye lalabo asebesiya egodini; senginjengendoda engelamandla.
Sengahlukaniselwe kwabafileyo, lezidumbu ezilele engcwabeni, wena ongasabakhumbuliyo njalo, abangasekho kulabo obanakekelayo.
Usungifake egodini elitshona okudlulayo, ekujuleni okumnyama bhuqe.
Intukuthelo yakho iyangeleka; usungigalulisile ngawo wonke amagagasi akho.
Usungithathele abangane bami abasekhwapheni wangenza ngaba lesidina kubo. Ngivalelwe kangiselantuba;
amehlo ami asebona kalufifi ngenxa yosizi. Ngiyakubiza, Oh Thixo, insuku zonke; ngiphakamisela izandla zami kuwe.
Izimanga zakho uyazitshengisa kwabafileyo na? Kambe labo asebefile bangavuka bakudumise na?
Uthando lwakho luyamenyezelwa engcwabeni yini, ukuthembeka kwakho endaweni yokuBhubha na?
Izimanga zakho ziyaziwa yini endaweni yobumnyama, kumbe izenzo zakho zokulunga elizweni lokungabikho na?
Kodwa ngikhala kuwe ngoncedo, Oh Thixo; ekuseni umkhuleko wami uyafika kuwe.
Kungani, awu Thixo, ungifulathela ungifihlela ubuso bakho?
Kusukela ebutsheni bami ngavele ngahlupheka ngaba seduze lokufa; ngiphethwe yikwesatshiswa nguwe, sengize ngidangele.
Intukuthelo yakho isingigabhele; ukwesaba wena sekungiqedile.
Ilanga lonke kungihanqile njengesikhukhula; sekungigalulisa nya.
Usungithathele abakhula bami lengibathandayo; ubumnyama sebunguyena mngane wami oseduze.

Ngizahlabelela ngothando lukaThixo olukhulu lanininini; ngomlomo wami ngizakwenza ukuthembeka kwakho kwaziwe ezizukulwaneni zonke.
Ngizamemezela ukuthi uthando lwakho lumi luqinile laphakade, ukuthi ukuthembeka kwakho wakugxilisa ezulwini uqobo.
Wathi, “Sengenze isivumelwano lalowo okhethiweyo wami, sengifungile kuDavida inceku yami,
‘Ngizawumisa umndeni wakho laphakade, ngisiqinise isihlalo sakho sobukhosi kuzozonke izizukulwane.’ ”
Amazulu ayazidumisa izimanga zakho, Oh Thixo, lokuthembeka kwakho emhlanganweni wabangcwele.
Phela ngubani onjengoThixo phakathi kwabaphilayo ezulwini na? Ngubani onjengoThixo phakathi kwabaphilayo ezulwini na?
Enhlanganisweni yabangcwele uNkulunkulu uyesatshwa kakhulu; uyesabeka kulabo bonke abahlezi laye.
Yebo Thixo Nkulunkulu Somandla, ngubani onjengawe na? Ulamandla, Oh Thixo, ukuthembeka kwakho kukuhonqolozele.
Uyabusa phezu kolwandle olugubhazelayo; lapho amavinqo alo equbuka, uyawathulisa.
Wamchoboza uRahabi njengomunye wababuleweyo; ngengalo yakho elamandla wazichitha izitha.
Ngawakho amazulu, ngowakho njalo lomhlaba; wawudala umhlaba lakho konke okukuwo.
Wayidala inyakatho kanye leningizimu; iThabhori leHemoni zihlabelela ibizo lakho ngentokozo.
Ingalo yakho igcwele amandla; isandla sakho siqinile, esokunene siphakeme.
Ukulunga lokwahlulela kuhle yikho okuyinsika yesihlalo sakho sobukhosi; uthando lokuthembeka kuhamba phambili kwakho.
Babusisiwe labo asebekufundile ukukubabaza, abahamba ekukhanyeni kobukhona bakho, Oh Thixo.
Bayathokoza ngebizo lakho ilanga lonke; bayagubhazela ngokulunga kwakho.
Ngoba uyibukhosi babo lamandla abo, kuthi ngomusa wakho uphakamise uphondo lwethu.
Ngempela isihlangu sethu ngesikaThixo, iNkosi yethu Kuye oYedwa oNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Endulo wakhuluma ngombono, ebantwini bakho abathembekileyo wathi: “Sengiwehlisele amandla phezu kweqhawe; sengiphakamise insizwa phakathi kwabantu.
Sengifumane uDavida inceku yami; ngamafutha ami angcwele sengimgcobile.
Isandla sami sizamsekela; ngempela ingalo yami izamqinisa.
Akulasitha esizamncindezela ukuthi athele kuso; kakho umuntu omubi ozamcindezela.
Ngizazichoboza izitha zakhe phambi kwakhe ngibalahlele phansi abalwa laye.
Uthando lwami oluthembekileyo luzaba laye, ukuthi ngebizo lami luphakanyiswe uphondo lwakhe.
Ngizabeka isandla sakhe phezu kolwandle, isandla sakhe sokunene phezu kwemifula.
Uzamemeza kimi athi, ‘UnguBaba, Nkulunkulu wami, iDwala elinguMsindisi wami.’
Njalo ngizamisa abe lizibulo lami, inkosi ephakeme ngaphezu kwawo wonke amakhosi omhlaba.
Ngizalugcina uthando lwami kuye laphakade, lesivumelwano sami laye kasiyikuphela.
Inzalo yakhe ngizayimisa nini lanini, lesihlalo sakhe sobukhosi kasiyikufa saphela.
Aluba amadodana akhe edela umlayo wami angalandeli izimiso zami,
nxa besephula izimemezelo zami behluleke ukugcina imiyalo yami,
ngizajezisa isono sabo ngoswazi, lesiphambeko sabo ngokubatshaya;
kodwa kangiyikulususa uthando lwami kuye, njalo kangisoze ngiguqule ukuthembeka kwami.
Kangiyikusephula isivumelwano sami kumbe ngiguqule lokho okuphume ezindebeni zami.
Ngavele ngafunga kanye ngobungcwele bami angiyikuqamba amanga kuDavida,
ukuthi inzalo yakhe izaqhubeka laphakade lesihlalo sakhe sobukhosi sizakuma phambi kwami njengelanga;
sizakuma laphakade njengenyanga, ufakazi othembekileyo yisibhakabhaka.”
Kodwa usumalile, usumlahlile, ubumthukuthelela kakhulu ogcotshiweyo wakho.
Ususikhalele isivumelwano lenceku yakho wawubhuqela othulini umqhele wakhe.
Usuyibhidlizile yonke imiduli yakhe, izinqaba zakhe wazenza amanxiwa.
Bonke abedlula khona bamphangile; useyinhlekisa yabomakhelwane.
Usuphakamisile isandla sokunene sezitha zakhe; usuwenze zonke izitha zakhe zathokoza.
Uyibuyisele emuva inkemba yakhe ebukhali awaze wamsekela empini.
Usuyiqedile inkazimulo yakhe wadilizela phansi isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi.
Uluqumile lwaba lufitshane usuku lobutsha bakhe; usumembese ingubo yehlazo.
Koze kube nini, Oh Thixo? Uzazifihla kokuphela na? Koze kube nini ulaka lwakho luvutha njengomlilo?
Khumbula ukwedlula masinyane kwempilo yami. Ngoba wabadalela ize nje abantu!
Ngumuntu bani ongaphila angaze abona ukufa, loba azisindise emandleni eliba na?
Oh Thixo, lungaphi uthando lwakho lwakudala olukhulu, okwathi ngokuthembeka kwakho wafunga ngalo kuDavida?
Khumbula, Thixo ukuthi inceku yakho iklolodelwa njani, ukuthi enhliziyweni yami ngithwele izigcono zezizwe,
izigcono izitha zakho eziklolode ngazo, Oh Thixo, okuthe ngazo zaklolodela ogcotshiweyo wakho kukho konke akwenzayo.
Udumo kalube kuThixo laphakade! Ameni njalo Ameni.

Thixo, wena ulikhaya lethu kuzozonke izizukulwane.
Izintaba zingakabikhona lalapho ungakawuvezi umhlaba kanye lelizwe, kusukela phakade kuze kube phakade unguNkulunkulu.
Ubuyisela abantu ethulini, usithi, “Buyelani othulini, lina madodana abantu.”
Ngoba iminyaka eyinkulungwane ekuboneni kwakho injengosuku olusanda kudlula, kumbe njengomlindo webusuku.
Uyabakhucula abantu ebuthongweni bokufa; banjengotshani obutsha obekuseni
lokuba ekuseni buhluma bubutsha, kuthi ntambama sebomile sebubunile.
Ulaka lwakho luyasitshabalalisa sithuthumeliswe yikucaphuka kwakho.
Usubuchayile ububi bethu phambi kwakho, izono zethu zensitha wazichaya ekukhanyeni kobukhona bakho.
Zonke insuku zethu ziyedlula ngaphansi kolaka lwakho; leminyaka yethu siyiphetha ngokububula.
Ubude bezinsuku zethu buyiminyaka engamatshumi ayisikhombisa loba amatshumi ayisificaminwembili, nxa silamandla; kanti lelobanga layo liluhlupho losizi, ngoba iphanga yedlule, lathi siphaphe nje sedlule.
Ngubani owaziyo amandla olaka lwakho na? Ngoba intukuthelo yakho inkulu njengokwesatshwa okukufaneleyo.
Sifundise ukubala kuhle insuku zethu, ukuze sizuze inhliziyo yenhlakanipho.
Phola, Oh Thixo! Koze kube nini kulokhu kunjalo na? Woba lesihawu ezincekwini zakho.
Sisuthise ekuseni ngothando lwakho olungaphuthiyo, ukuze sihlabelele ngentokozo sijabule zonke insuku zethu.
Senze sijabule okwensuku ezilingana ukusihlupha kwakho, okwensuku ezilingana lalezo esesabona ngazo ukudubeka.
Sengathi imisebenzi yakho ingatshengiswa ezincekwini zakho, inkazimulo yakho ebantwaneni babo.
Sengathi umusa weNkosi uNkulunkulu wethu ungehlela kithi; uqinise umsebenzi wezandla zethu yebo, qinisa umsebenzi wezandla zethu.
Lowo ohlala ekusithekeni koPhezukonke uzaphumula emthunzini kaSomandla.
Ngizakuthi kuThixo, “Uyisiphephelo sami lenqaba yami, uNkulunkulu wami, engithemba kuye.”
Ngempela uzakuphephisa emjibileni womthiyi lasesifeni esibi esibulalayo.
Uzakusibekela ngezinsiba zakhe, uzuze isiphephelo ngaphansi kwamaphiko akhe; ukuthembeka kwakhe kuzakuba yisihlangu sakho lenqaba yakho.
Awuyikwesaba umnyama wobusuku, loba umtshoko ontweza emini,
kumbe ingozi ehahabela emnyameni, kumbe umkhuhlane obhubhisayo emini enkulu.
Abazinkulungwane bangawa eceleni lakho; itshumi lezinkulungwane esandleni sakho sokunene, kodwa kakusoze kusondele kuwe.
Uzaphosa nje amehlo akho ubukele ubone ukujeziswa kwababi.
Ungenza oPhezukonke abe likhaya lakho yena uThixo oyisiphephelo sami
lapho-ke akulangozi engakuwela, akulamonakalo ozasondela ethenteni lakho.
Ngoba uzayala izingilosi zakhe ngawe zikulinde kuzozonke izindlela zakho;
zizakuphakamisa ezandleni zazo, ukuze ungakhubeki elitsheni.
Uzanyathela isilwane lephimpi; uzasigxoba isilwane esikhulu lenyoka.
“Ngoba uyangithanda,” kutsho uThixo, “ngizamkhulula; ngizamvikela, ngoba uyalinaka ibizo lami.
Uzangibiza, ngimphendule; ngizakuba laye ekuhluphekeni, ngizamkhulula ngimenzele udumo.
Ngizamsuthisa ngempilo ende ngimtshengise insindiso yami.”
Kuhle ukudumisa uThixo lokuhlabelela ebizweni lakho, wena oPhezukonke,
ukumemezela uthando lwakho ekuseni lokuthembeka kwakho ebusuku,
ukutshaya iziginci ngomhubhe wezintambo ezilitshumi lemvungamo emnandi yechacho.
Ngoba uyangijabulisa ngezenzo zakho, Oh Thixo; ngihlala ngentokozo ngomsebenzi wezandla zakho.
Mikhulu kangaka imisebenzi yakho, Oh Thixo, izikile imicabango yakho!
Umuntu ongelangqondo akazi, iziwula kazizwisisi,
ukuthi loba ababi bemila njengotshani lezigangi zonke ziphumelela, zizabhujiswa nini lanini.
Kodwa wena Thixo, uphakeme laphakade.
Ngoba ngempela izitha zakho, Oh Thixo, ngempela izitha zakho zizabhubha; zonke izigangi zizachithizwa.
Uluphakamisile uphondo lwami njengolwenyathi; ngagcotshwa ngamakha amnandi.
Amehlo ami abonile ukwehlulwa kwezitha zami; indlebe zami zizwile ngokuchithizwa kwezitha zami ezimbi.
Abalungileyo bazaqhela njengesihlahla selala, bazakhula njengomsedari waseLebhanoni;
ngoba behlanyelwe endlini kaThixo, bazaqhela emagumeni kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Bazabe belokhu bethela izithelo lanxa sebebadala, bazahlala belokhu behluma beluhlaza,
bememezela besithi, “UThixo uqotho; uliDwala lami, kakukho bubi kuye.”

UThixo uyabusa, ugqoke ubukhosi; uThixo ugqoke ubukhosi njalo uzihlome ngamandla. Umhlaba ugxilile uqinile; ngeke ugudlulwe.
Isihlalo sakho saqiniswa ekadeni; uNguwe kusukela phakade.
Inlwandle seziphakamisile, Oh Thixo, inlwandle ziliphakamisile ilizwi lazo; inlwandle ziwaphakamisile amagagasi azo agubhuzelayo.
Ngamandla adlula umdumo wamanzi amanengi, ngamandla adlula awokugubhuza kolwandle uThixo ophezulu ulamandla.
Izimiso zakhe zimi ziqinile; ubungcwele bukhazimulisa indlu Yakho okwensuku ezingapheliyo, Oh Thixo.
Oh Thixo, uNkulunkulu ophindiselayo, Oh Nkulunkulu ophindiselayo, khanya uvele.
Phakama, awu Mahluli womhlaba; baphindisele abazigqajayo ngokubafaneleyo.
Koze kube nini ababi, Oh Thixo, koze kube nini ababi beklamasa na?
Bathulula amazwi okukloloda; zonke izigangi zifuthelene ngokuzikhukhumeza.
Ziyabanyathezela abantu bakho, Oh Thixo; zincindezela ilifa lakho.
Zibulala umfelokazi kanye lowezizweni; zibulala intandane.
Zithi, “UThixo kaboni; uNkulunkulu kaJakhobe kananzi.”
Limukani, lina elingelangqondo phakathi kwabantu; lina ziphukuphuku, lizahlakanipha nini?
Yena lowo owayigxumekayo indlebe kezwa yini? Yena lowo owabumba ilihlo kaboni na?
Yena lowo oqondisa izizwe kajezisi yini? Yena lowo ofundisa umuntu kalalwazi na?
UThixo uyayazi imicabango yomuntu; uyayazi ukuthi iyize nje.
Ubusisiwe umuntu omqondisayo, Oh Thixo, umuntu omfundisa okomthetho wakho;
uyamphumuza ensukwini zokuhlupheka, kuze kuthi ababi bembelwe igodi.
Ngoba uThixo kazukwala abantu bakhe; kasoze lanini afulathele ilifa lakhe.
Ukwahlulela kuzaphinda njalo kumiswe ngokulunga, kuthi bonke abaqotho ngenhliziyo bakulandele.
Ngubani ozangimela ekulweni lababi na? Ngubani ozangelekelela ekulweni lezigangi na?
Aluba uThixo wayengangelulekanga, ngabe ngahle ngahlala ngathula zwi ekufeni.
Lapho ngasengisithi, “Unyawo lwami selutshelela,” uthando lwakho, Oh Thixo, lwangisekela.
Nxa ukunqineka kwase kungikhulela, induduzo yakho yaletha intokozo emphefumulweni wami.
Kambe isihlalo sobukhosi esixhwalileyo singema lawe yini leso esiletha inhlupheko ngezimemezelo zaso?
Bayahlangana ukumelana labalungileyo ongelacala agwetshelwe ukufa.
Kodwa uThixo useyinqaba yami, loNkulunkulu wami ulidwala engiphephela kulo.
Uzabaphindisela ngenxa yezono zabo ababhubhise ngenxa yobubi babo; uThixo uNkulunkulu wethu uzababhubhisa.
Wozani sihlabelele ngentokozo kuThixo; kasihlokomeni kamnandi kulo iDwala lokusindiswa kwethu.
Kasizeni phambi kwakhe ngokubonga simdumise ngamachacho langengoma.
Ngoba uThixo unguNkulunkulu omkhulu, iNkosi enkulu ngaphezu kwabonkulunkulu bonke.
Inziki zomhlaba zisezandleni zakhe, leziqongo zezintaba ngezakhe.
Ngolwakhe ulwandle ngoba walwenza, lezandla zakhe zawenza umhlaba owomileyo.
Wozani, kasikhothame simkhonze, kasiguqe phambi kukaThixo uMenzi wethu;
ngoba unguNkulunkulu wethu, thina singabantu bedlelo lakhe, umhlambi awunakekelayo. Lamhla, nxa lisizwa ilizwi lakhe,
lingazenzi lukhuni inhliziyo zenu njengoba lenzenjalo eMeribha, njengelakwenza ngaleliyana ilanga eMasa enkangala,
lapho okhokho benu abangilinga khona bengizama, lanxa babekubonile engakwenzayo.
Okweminyaka engamatshumi amane ngangisizondele lesosizukulwane; ngathi, “Bangabantu onhliziyo zabo ziyahlanhlatha, njalo kabazazanga izindlela zami.”
Ngakho ngamemezela ngesifungo ekuthukutheleni kwami ngathi, “Kabayikungena ekuphumuleni kwami.”
Hlabelani kuThixo ingoma entsha; hlabelani kuThixo mhlaba wonke.
Hlabelani kuThixo, dumisani ibizo lakhe; memezelani insindiso yakhe insuku ngezinsuku.
Fakazani ngobukhosi bakhe ezizweni zonke, lemisebenzi yakhe emangalisayo phakathi kwabantu bonke.
Ngoba umkhulu uThixo, ufanele ukudunyiswa ngokuphindiweyo; kumele esatshwe ngaphezu kwabonkulunkulu bonke.
Ngoba bonke onkulunkulu bezizwe bayizithombe, kodwa uThixo wadala amazulu.
Inkazimulo lobukhosi kuphambi Kwakhe; amandla lobukhosi kusendlini yakhe engcwele.
Mnikeni uThixo, lina zizukulwane zezizwe. Mnikeni uThixo ubukhosi lamandla.
Mnikeni uThixo udumo olufanele ibizo lakhe. Lethani umnikelo libuye phambi kwakhe.
Mkhonzeni uThixo enkazimulweni yobungcwele bakhe; thuthumelani phambi kwakhe mhlaba wonke.
Wothini phakathi kwezizwe, “UThixo uyabusa.” Umhlaba ugxilile, ungeke wagudluzwa; uzabehlulela abantu ngokubafaneleyo.
Amazulu kawathokoze, lomhlaba ujabule; ulwandle kaluhlokome, lakho konke okukulo;
amasimu kawathakazelele lakho konke okukuwo. Lapho-ke izihlahla zonke zeganga zizahlabela ngentokozo;
phambi kukaThixo, ngoba uyeza, uyeza ukuzakwahlulela umhlaba. Uzakwahlulela umhlaba ngokulunga, ahlulele abantu ngeqiniso.
UThixo uyabusa, umhlaba kawuthokoze; akuthi amakhumbi akude ajabule.
Amayezi lomnyama omkhulu kumsibekele; ukulunga lokwahlulela kuhle kuyisisekelo sesihlalo Sakhe sobukhosi.
Umlilo uhamba phambi Kwakhe uzihangule izitha zakhe inxa zonke.
Umbane wakhe ukhanyisa umhlaba; umhlaba ukubone lokho uthuthumele.
Izintaba zincibilika njengengcino phambi kukaThixo, phambi kweNkosi yomhlaba wonke.
Amazulu amemezela ukulunga kwayo, labantu bonke bayayibona inkazimulo yayo.
Bonke abakhonza izifanekiso bathelwa ihlazo, labo abazikhukhumeza ngezithombe mkhonzeni, lonke lina bonkulunkulu!
IZiyoni iyezwa ithokoze lemizi yakoJuda iyajabula ngenxa yokwahlulela Kwakho, Oh Thixo.
Ngoba wena, Oh Thixo ungoPhezukonke kuwo wonke umhlaba; uphakeme ngaphezulu kakhulu kwabonkulunkulu bonke.
Akuthi bonke abamthandayo, uThixo, bazonde okubi, ngoba uyazilinda impilo zabathembekileyo bakhe abakhulule esandleni sababi.
Ukukhanya kuyehliselwa kwabalungileyo lentokozo kwabaqotho enhliziyweni.
Thokozani kuThixo lina elilungileyo, lidumise ibizo lakhe elingcwele.
Hlabelelani uThixo ingoma entsha, ngoba wenzile izinto ezimangalisayo; isandla sakhe sokunene lengalo yakhe engcwele sekumenzele insindiso.
UThixo useyenze yaziwa insindiso yakhe waveza ukulunga kwakhe ezizweni.
Uselukhumbule uthando lwakhe lokuthembeka Kwakhe endlini ka-Israyeli; yonke imikhawulo yomhlaba iyibonile insindiso kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Hlokomani ngentokozo kuThixo, mhlaba wonke, hlabelani ingoma ngokujabula okukhulu, litshaya amachacho;
yenzani umsindo kuThixo ngomhubhe, ngomhubhe langomsindo wokuhlabela,
ngamacilongo langomsindo wophondo lwenqama hlokomani ngentokozo phambi kukaThixo, iNkosi.
Akuthi ulwandle luhlokome, lakho konke okuphakathi kwalo, umhlaba labo bonke abahlala kuwo.
Akuthi imifula iqakeze izandla zayo, akuthi izintaba zihlabele kanyekanye ngentokozo;
kazihlabele phambi kukaThixo, ngoba Uyeza ukuzakwahlulela umhlaba. Uzakwahlulela umhlaba ngokulunga labantu bonke ngokufaneleyo.
UThixo uyabusa, izizwe kazithuthumele; uhlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi phakathi kwamakherubhi, umhlaba kawuzamazame.
Mkhulu uThixo eZiyoni; uphakeme ngaphezu kwezizwe zonke.
Kabadumise ibizo Lakho elikhulu elesabekayo Yena ungcwele.
INkosi ilamandla, ithanda ukwahlulela okuhle umisile ukwaba ngemfanelo; kuJakhobe usuwenzile okuqondileyo lokulungileyo.
Dumisani uThixo uNkulunkulu wethu likhonze phansi kwesihlalo sakhe; yena ungcwele.
UMosi lo-Aroni babephakathi kwabaphristi bakhe, uSamuyeli wayekulabo ababelibiza ibizo lakhe; bambiza uThixo Yena wabaphendula.
Wabakhulumisa ephakathi kwensika yeyezi; bagcina izimiso zakhe lezimemezelo azitshoyo kubo.
Oh Thixo Nkulunkulu wethu, wabaphendula; ku-Israyeli wawunguNkulunkulu othethelelayo, lanxa wabajezisa ngenxa yezenzo zabo ezimbi.
Phakamisani uThixo uNkulunkulu wethu, limkhonze entabeni yakhe engcwele, ngoba uThixo uNkulunkulu wethu ungcwele.
Hlokomani ngentokozo kuThixo, mhlaba wonke.
Mkhonzeni uThixo ngenjabulo; wozani phambi Kwakhe ngezingoma zokuthokoza.
Yazini ukuthi uThixo unguNkulunkulu. Nguye owasenzayo, singabantu bakhe, izimvu zedlelo lakhe.
Ngenani emasangweni akhe ngokubonga lemagumeni akhe ngokudumisa; mbongeni lidumise ibizo lakhe.
Ngoba uThixo ulungile lothando lwakhe lumi kuze kube phakade; ukuthembeka kwakhe kumi kuzozonke izizukulwane.
Ngizahlabelela ngothando lwakho lokwahlulela kwakho okuhle; kuwe, Oh Thixo, ngizahlabelela indumiso.
Ngizananzelela ukuthi ngiphile impilo engasolekiyo uzakuza nini kimi na? Ngizahamba endlini yami ngenhliziyo engasolekiyo.
Phambi kwamehlo ami angiyikubeka lutho olungcolileyo. Izenzo zabantu abangakholwayo ngiyazizonda; kazizukunginamathela.
Abantu abalenhliziyo exhwalileyo bazakuba khatshana lami; angiyikuhambelana lobubi.
Lowo ochothoza umakhelwane wakhe ngasese, lowo ngizamthulisa; olamehlo asesiphundu lenhliziyo ezigqajayo, lowo kangilasikhathi laye.
Amehlo ami azakuba kwabathembekileyo elizweni, ukuthi bahlale lami; lowo okuhamba kwakhe kakulansolo uzangisebenzela ekhonza kimi.
Kakho othanda ukwenza inkohliso ozahlala endlini yami; kakho okhuluma amanga ozakuma phambi kwami.
Zonke insuku ekuseni ngizabathulisa bonke ababi phakathi kwelizwe; ngizamlahla phansi wonke umuntu oyisigangi edolobheni likaThixo.
Zwana umkhuleko wami, Oh Thixo; ukukhala kwami ngicela uncedo kakufike kuwe.
Ungangifihleli ubuso bakho nxa ngikhathazekile. Ngipha indlebe yakho; nxa ngibiza ngiphendula masinyane.
Ngoba insuku zami ziyanyamalala njengentuthu; amathambo ami ayavutha njengamalahle abhebhayo.
Inhliziyo yami yonakele, ibunile njengotshani; ngiyakhohlwa ukudla kwami.
Ngenxa yokububula kwami okukhulu sengiphelile, isikhumba sesinamathela emathanjeni.
Sengifana lesikhova senkangala, njengesikhova semanxiweni.
Ngilala ngikhangele; senginjengenyoni ehlezi yodwa ephahleni.
Ilanga lonke izitha zami ziyangichukuluza; labo abangichothozayo badlala ngebizo lami njengesethuko.
Ngoba ngidla umlotha njengokudla kwami, ngixube okunathwayo kwami ngezinyembezi
ngenxa yokuthukuthela kwakho okukhulu, ngoba ungiqukule wangilahlela eceleni.
Insuku zami zifana lesithunzi sakusihlwa; ngiyabuna njengotshani.
Kodwa wena, Oh Thixo, uhlezi ebukhosini lanininini; udumo lwakho lumi ezizukulwaneni zonke.
Uzaphakama uzwele iZiyoni isihawu, ngoba sekuyisikhathi sokutshengisa umusa kuyo, isikhathi esimisiweyo sesifikile.
Ngoba amatshe ayo aligugu ezincekwini zakho; othuli lwayo nje lubalethela usizi.
Izizwe zizalesaba ibizo likaThixo, wonke amakhosi omhlaba azahlonipha inkazimulo yakhe.
Ngoba uThixo uzayakha kutsha iZiyoni avele enkazimulweni yakhe.
Uzaphendula imikhuleko yabahluphekayo; kazukweyisa isicelo sabo.
Lokhu kakulotshwe phansi kube ngokwesizukulwane sakusasa, ukuze abantu abangakadalwa bamdumise uThixo :
“UThixo wakhangela phansi ephezulu endlini yakhe engcwele, esezulwini wawuhlola umhlaba,
ukuze ezwe ukububula kwezibotshwa lokukhulula labo ababegwetshelwe ukufa.”
Ngalokho-ke ibizo likaThixo lizamenyezelwa eZiyoni lodumo lwakhe eJerusalema,
lapha izizwe lemibuso sekuhlangana ndawonye ukukhonza uThixo.
Wawanciphisa amandla ami ngisaphila; waziphungula insuku zami.
Yikho ngasengisithi, “Ungangithathi, Oh Nkulunkulu wami, ngilokhu ngisephakathi kwensuku zami; iminyaka yakho ihlala ikhona ezizukulwaneni zonke.
Ekuqaleni wabeka izisekelo zomhlaba, lamazulu angumsebenzi wezandla zakho.
Konke kuzabhubha, kodwa wena uzasala; konke kuzaguga njengesigqoko. Njengesivunulo uzakuguqula kucine sekulahlwa.
Kodwa wena uhlala unjalo, leminyaka yakho kayiyikuphela.
Abantwana bezinceku zakho bazahlala besemehlweni akho; izizukulwane zazo zizaqiniswa phambi kwakho.”

Dumisa uThixo, Oh mphefumulo wami; konke okuphakathi kwami, kakudumise ibizo lakhe elingcwele.
Dumisa uThixo, Oh mphefumulo wami, ungaze wakhohlwa konke okuhle okuthola kuye
othethelelayo zonke izono zakho akusilise kuzozonke izifo zakho,
ohlenga impilo yakho egodini akwethese uthando lesihawu,
osuthisa izifiso zakho ngezinto ezinhle ukuze ubutsha bakho buvuselelwe njengengqungqulu.
UThixo ubenzela ukulunga lokwahlulela okuhle labo abancindezelweyo.
Izindlela zakhe wazazisa uMosi, izenzo zakhe wazazisa abantu bako-Israyeli;
uThixo ulesihawu njalo ulomusa, uyaphuza ukuthukuthela, kodwa uyanda ngothando.
Kahlali ebeka imilandu futhi kagcini ulaka lwakhe kokuphela;
kasiphathi ngokufanele izono zethu kumbe asijezise ngokulingene iziphambeko zethu.
Ngoba njengokuphakama komkhathi ngaphezu komhlaba, lukhulu kangako uthando lwakhe kulabo abamesabayo;
njengobukhatshana bempumalanga kuyo intshonalanga kanjalo ususile iziphambeko zethu kithi.
Ngendlela ubaba elozwelo ebantwaneni bakhe, kanjalo uThixo ulozwelo kulabo abamesabayo;
ngoba uyakwazi ukuthi sibunjwe njani, uyakhumbula ukuthi siluthuli.
Umuntu yena insuku zakhe zinjengotshani, ukhula amemetheke njengembali yeganga;
umoya uyayiphephetha ihle inyamalale, indawo yakhe ingabe isayikhumbula lanini.
Kodwa kusukela phakade kusiya phakade uthando lukaThixo lukulabo abamesabayo, lokulunga Kwakhe ebantwaneni babantwana
kulabo abagcina isivumelwano Sakhe njalo bakhumbule ukulalela izimiso zakhe.
UThixo usemisile isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi ezulwini, njalo ubukhosi bakhe buphezu kwakho konke.
Dumisani uThixo, lina zingilosi, lina zinceku zakhe elenza intando yakhe, elilalela ilizwi lakhe.
Dumisani uThixo, lonke mabutho akhe asezulwini, lina zinceku zakhe elenza intando yakhe.
Dumisani uThixo, imisebenzi yakhe yonke ezindaweni zonke embusweni wakhe. Dumisa uThixo, Oh mphefumulo wami.
Dumisa uThixo, Oh mphefumulo wami. Oh Thixo Nkulunkulu wami, umkhulu kakhulu; ugqoke inkazimulo lobukhosi.
Uyazigoqela ngokukhanya kungathi njengesivunulo; amazulu uyawelula njengethente
anqumise intungo zezindlu zangaphezulu zilale phezu kwamanzi. Wenza amayezi inqola yakhe yamabhiza, undiza ngezimpiko zomoya.
Wenza izikhatha zomoya zibe yizithunywa zakhe, amalangabi omlilo izinceku zakhe.
Wawugxilisa umhlaba ezisekelweni zawo; ungeke wagudlulwa.
Wawembesa ngolwandle njengesivunulo; amanzi ema ngaphezu kwezintaba.
Kodwa wathi ngokukhwaza amanzi abaleka, ngomsindo wokuduma kwakho asibathela;
ageleza phezu kwezintaba, ehlela ezigodini endaweni owamisele kuyo.
Wamisa umkhawulo angeke aweqe; kasayikubuya awugubuzele njalo umhlaba lanini.
Wenza imithombo impompozele amanzi ezindongeni; ageleza phakathi kwezintaba,
zipha amanzi kuzozonke izinyamazana zeganga; labobabhemi beganga bacitsha lapho ukoma.
Izinyoni zomoya zakhela eduze kwamanzi; ziyatshiloza phakathi kwezingatsha.
Uyazithelezela izintaba esezindlini zakhe eziphezulu; umhlaba uyawusuthisa ngezithelo zomsebenzi wakhe.
Umilisela inkomo utshani, ahlanyelele abantu bona bahlakule kuzuzakale ukudla emhlabathini:
iwayini elijabulisa inhliziyo yomuntu, amagcobo enza ubuso bakhe bukhazimule, lesinkwa esilulamisa inhliziyo yakhe.
Izihlahla zikaThixo ziyathelelwa okwaneleyo, imisedari yeLebhanoni ayihlanyelayo.
Izinyoni zakhela kuyo izidleke zazo; ingabuzane lakha indlu yalo ezihlahleni zephayini.
Izintaba eziphakemeyo ngezamagogo, amawa ayisiphephelo sezimbila.
Inyanga yehlukanisa izibanga zomnyaka, lelanga liyazi ukuthi litshona nini.
Uletha umnyama, kube sebusuku, lapho zonke izinyamazana zeganga zizingele.
Izilwane ziyabhonga zifuna inyama yazo zidinga ukudla kwazo kuNkulunkulu.
Ilanga liyaphuma, zibe sezicatsha; ziyabuyela ezikhundleni zazo zilale.
Umuntu abe esephuma aye emsebenzini wakhe, ayotshikatshika kuze kube ntambama.
Minengi kanganani imisebenzi yakho, Oh Thixo! Zonke wazenza ngenhlakanipho; umhlaba ugcwele izidalwa zakho.
Nantuyana ulwandle, uthwaca olungakaya, olunyakazela ngezidalwa ezingelakubalwa izinto eziphilayo ezinkulu lezincinyane.
Kulapho imikhumbi endenda khona isiyale lale, loleviyathani, isilo owasenza ukuthi sidlale khona.
Zonke lezi zikhangele kuwe ukuthi uziphe ukudla ngesikhathi esifaneleyo.
Uthi ungazipha bese zikubuthela ndawonye; uthi ungavula isandla sakho, zisuthiswe ngezinto ezinhle.
Uthi ungafihla ubuso bakho zitshaywe luvalo; uthi ungathatha umphefumulo wazo, zife zibuyele othulini.
Uthi ungathumela uMoya wakho zidalwe, uwenze ube muhle umhlaba.
Sengathi inkazimulo kaThixo ingema lanini; sengathi uThixo angathokoza ngemisebenzi yakhe
yena okhangela umhlaba uthuthumele, othinta izintaba zithunqe intuthu.
Ngizahlabelela kuThixo impilo yami yonke; ngizahlabelela indumiso kuNkulunkulu wami lanini nxa ngisaphila.
Sengathi iminakano yami ingamthokozisa, ngoba ngiyathokoza kuThixo.
Kodwa sengathi izoni zinganyamalala emhlabeni lezigangi zingabe zisaba khona. Dumisa uThixo, Oh Mphefumulo wami. Dumisa uThixo, Oh Mphefumulo wami.
Bongani uThixo, memezani ibizo lakhe; lizazise phakathi kwabantu izenzo zakhe
Hlabelelani kuye, hlabelelani indumiso kuye; likhulume ngezenzo zakhe zonke ezimangalisayo.
Jabulani ebizweni lakhe elingcwele; kazithokoze inhliziyo zabo abamdingayo uThixo.
Dingani uThixo lamandla akhe, limdinge yena njalonjalo.
Khumbulani izenzo zakhe ezimangalisayo azenzayo, izimangaliso azenzayo, lezahlulelo azikhulumayo,
lina zizukulwane zika-Abhrahama inceku yakhe, lina madodana kaJakhobe, abakhethiweyo bakhe.
UnguThixo uNkulunkulu wethu; izahlulelo zakhe zisemhlabeni wonke.
Uyasikhumbula isivumelwano sakhe nini lanini, ilizwi lomlayo wakhe, okwezizukulwane ezizinkulungwane,
isivumelwano asenza lo-Abhrahama, isifungo asifungayo ku-Isaka.
Wakuqinisa lokhu kuJakhobe kwaba yisimiso ku-Israyeli njengesivumelwano saphakade:
wathi “Ngizalinika ilizwe laseKhenani njengesabelo selifa lenu.”
Kwathi besesebalutshwana, bebalutshwana kakhulu, beyizihambi kulo,
bezula kuzizwe ngezizwe besuka komunye umbuso besiya komunye.
Kavumelanga loba ngubani ukubancindezela; wawakhuza amakhosi ngenxa yabo:
“Lingabathinti abagcotshiweyo bami; lingahlukuluzi abaphrofethi bami.”
Waletha indlala elizweni wachitha zonke iziphala zokudla;
wathumela indoda yabandulela uJosefa owathengiswa waba yisigqili.
Bambhonxula inyawo zakhe ngezibopho, wabotshwa intamo ngezinsimbi,
kwaze kwathi lokho ayekutsho ngaphambili kwagcwaliseka, kwaze kwathi ilizwi likaThixo latshengisa ukuthi wayeqinisile.
Inkosi yathumela ukuthi akhululwe, umbusi wezizwe wamkhulula.
Wamenza umbusi wendlu yakhe, umbusi wakho konke okwakungokwakhe,
ukuqondisa amakhosana akhe njengokubona kwakhe lokufundisa abadala bakhe inhlakanipho.
Kwathi-ke u-Israyeli wayangena eGibhithe; uJakhobe wahlala njengowezizweni elizweni likaHamu.
UThixo wenza abantu bakhe banda kakhulu; wabenza baba banengi kakhulu bandela izitha zabo,
kwathi inhliziyo zabo wazenza zazonda abantu bakhe, bakha amacebo amabi ngezinceku zakhe.
Wathuma uMosi inceku yakhe, lo-Aroni ayebakhethile.
Benza iziboniso zakhe ezimangalisayo phakathi kwabo, izimanga zakhe elizweni likaHamu.
Wathumela umnyama wenza ilizwe laba mnyama kanti angithi babewahlamukele amazwi akhe?
Waguqula amanzi abo aba ligazi, okwenza inhlanzi zawo zafa.
Ilizwe labo lanyakazela ngamaxoxo, angena ezindlini zokulala ezababusi babo.
Wakhuluma, kwavela umtshitshi wezibawu, lenswintila elizweni labo lonke.
Wenza izulu labo laba yisiqhotho, laba lombane elizweni labo lonke;
wacakazela phansi amavini abo lemikhiwa, waphundla izihlahla zelizwe labo.
Wakhuluma zatheleka izintethe, izintethe ezingelakubalwa;
zadla yonke into eluhlaza elizweni labo, zadla izithelo zomhlabathi wabo.
Ngemva kwalokho wasebulala amazibulo wonke elizweni labo, izithelo zokuqala zobulisa babo.
Wamkhupha u-Israyeli, ethwele esisitheka isiliva legolide, kakwaba lamunye phakathi kwezizwana zabo owehlulwa yikufa.
IGibhithe yathokoza ngokusuka kwabo, ngoba base bemesaba kubi u-Israyeli.
Wendlala iyezi lagubuzela, lomlilo ukukhanyisa ebusuku.
Bacela wabalethela izagwaca, wabasuthisa ngesinkwa sasezulwini.
Wavula ilitshe amanzi antshaza; njengomfula ageleza enkangala.
Ngoba wakhumbula isithembiso sakhe esingcwele esaphiwa inceku yakhe u-Abhrahama.
Wabakhupha abantu bakhe ngokuthokoza, abakhethiweyo bakhe ngenhlokomo yentokozo.
Wabapha amazwe ezizwe, badla ilifa lalokho okwakuginqelwe ngabanye,
ukuze bagcine iziqondiso zakhe njalo balalele imithetho yakhe. Dumisani uThixo.
Dumisani uThixo. Bongani uThixo, ngoba ulungile; uthando lwakhe lumi lanini.
Ngubani ongamemezela imisebenzi emikhulu kaThixo loba atsho ngokugcweleyo udumo lwakhe na?
Babusisiwe labo abahlala besenza ngendlela enhle, abahlezi besenza okulungileyo.
Ungikhumbule, Thixo, nxa usuveza umusa ebantwini bakho, woza ungisize nxatshana usubasindisa,
ukuze lami ngikholise ukuphumelela kwalabo obakhethileyo, ukuze ngabelwe entokozweni yesizwe sakho ngihlanganyele lelifa lakho ekudumiseni.
Sonile, njengalokho abakwenzayo okhokho bethu; senzile okubi senza izinto ezimbi.
Lapho okhokho bethu beseGibhithe, kabayinakanga imimangaliso yakho; kabazikhumbulanga izenzo zakho zomusa ezinengi, bahlamuka besolwandle, uLwandle oluBomvu.
Kodwa wabasindisa ngenxa yebizo lakhe, ukuze amandla akhe amakhulu aziwe.
Walukhuza uLwandle oluBomvu, loma qha; wabahola badabula ezinzikini njengasenkangala.
Wabasindisa esandleni sesitha; wabahlenga esandleni sesitha.
Amanzi asibekela izitha zabo, kakho loyedwa wazo owasindayo.
Lapho-ke base bezikholwa izithembiso zakhe bahlabelela indumiso yakhe.
Kodwa baphanga bakukhohlwa lokho ayekwenzile kabaze balindela ukweluleka kwakhe.
Enkangala bakhulelwa yizinkanuko zabo; khona emqothwini bamlinga uNkulunkulu.
Ngakho wabapha lokho abakucelayo, kodwa wabathela ngomkhuhlane ocikizayo.
Ezihonqweni basuka babalomhawu loMosi njalo lango-Aroni, owayengcwelisiwe kuThixo.
Umhlaba wavuleka waginya uDathani; wagqibela ixuku lika-Abhiramu.
Umlilo walavuza phakathi kwabalandeli babo; ilangabi labatshisa ababi.
EHorebhi benza ithole, bakhonza isithombe esenziwe ngensimbi.
Badela ukuKhazimula kwabo bakhetha isithombe senkunzi edla utshani.
Bakhohlwa uNkulunkulu owabasindisayo, owayenze izinto ezinkulu eGibhithe,
imimangaliso elizweni likaHamu lezenzo ezibabazekayo ngasoLwandle oluBomvu.
Ngakho wathi uzababhubhisa aluba kungesuMosi, owakhethwayo wakhe, owema phambi kwakhe ukuvalela ulaka lwakhe ukuze angababhubhisi.
Kwathi njalo baleyisa ilizwe elihle; kabasikholwanga isithembiso sakhe.
Bakhonona besemathenteni abo kabaze bamlalela uThixo.
Ngakho wafunga kubo ephakamise isandla sakhe ukuthi wayezabenza bafele enkangala,
enze izizukulwane zabo ziqedwe ngabezizwe zihlakazeke emazweni wonke.
Bazibopha ingathi kusejogweni kuBhali wasePheyori badla imihlatshelo eyayinikelwe kubonkulunkulu abangaphiliyo;
bamthukuthelisa uThixo ngezenzo zabo ezimbi; kwavela isifo phakathi kwabo.
Kodwa uFinehasi wema wancenga isifo sadeda.
Lokhu kwenza kuthiwe wayelungile kwaziswa izizukulwane zonke ezizayo.
Bamzondisa uThixo ngasemthonjeni weMeribha, uhlupho lwase lusehlela uMosi ngenxa yabo;
ngoba bahlamukela uMoya kaNkulunkulu, uMosi waze wakhupha amazwi amabi ngezindebe zakhe.
Kabababhubhisanga abantu bezizwe njengalokhu ababekulaywe nguThixo,
kodwa baphithikana labezizwe bathatha imikhuba yazo.
Bakhonza izithombe zazo, kwaba yisifu kubo.
Benza imihlatshelo ngamadodana abo lamadodakazi abo emadimonini.
Bachitha igazi elalingelacala, igazi lamadodana lamadodakazi abo, abenza ngabo imihlatshelo yezithombe zaseKhenani, ilizwe langcola ngegazi labo.
Bazingcolisa ngalokho abakwenzayo; ngezenzo zabo baziphatha njengeziphingi.
Ngakho uThixo wabathukuthelela abantu bakhe wanengwa yilifa lakhe.
Wabanikela kwabezizwe, izitha zabo zabusa phezu kwabo.
Izitha zabo zabancindezela zababeka ngaphansi kwamandla azo.
Izikhathi ezinengi wabakhulula, kodwa babezimisele ukuhlamuka bacikizeka ngenxa yesono sabo.
Kodwa wananzelela ukuhlupheka kwabo esezwile ukukhala kwabo;
ngenxa yokubahawukela wakhumbula isivumelwano sakhe, kwathi ngothando lwakhe olukhulu wadeda.
Wenza bonke labo ababebathumbile ukuthi babelesihawu kubo.
Sisindise, Oh Thixo Nkulunkulu wethu, usiqoqe usikhulule phakathi kwezizwe, ukuze silibonge ibizo lakho elingcwele sijabule ekukudumiseni.
Kabongwe uThixo, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, kusukela nini kuze kube nininini. Akuthi bonke abantu bathi, “Ameni!” Dumisani uThixo.
Mbongeni uThixo ngoba ulungile, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Akuthi abahlengiweyo bakaThixo batsho lokhu, labo abahlenga esandleni sesitha,
labo abaqoqa emazweni kusuka empumalanga kusiya entshonalanga, kusuka enyakatho laseningizimu.
Abanye bantula egwaduleni lwenkangala, baswela indlela eya emzini ababengahlala khona.
Balamba boma, impilo zabo zancipha.
Basebekhala kuThixo besekuhluphekeni kwabo, wasebakhulula osizini lwabo.
Wabahola ngendlela eqondileyo baya edolobheni lapho ababengahlala khona.
Ngakho kabambonge uThixo ngothando lwakhe olungaphuthiyo lezenzo zakhe ezimangalisayo azenzela abantu,
ngoba ubenza bakholwe abomileyo asuthise abalambileyo ngezinto ezinhle.
Abanye bahlala emnyameni lasethunzini elinzima beyizibotshwa ezihluphekayo zibotshwe ngamaketane ensimbi,
ngoba babewahlamukele amazwi kaNkulunkulu beyisa iseluleko soPhezukonke.
Ngakho wabathwalisa umsebenzi onzima; bawa kodwa kungekho ongabasiza.
Ngakho basebekhala kuThixo besekuhluphekeni kwabo wabasindisa osizini lwabo.
Wabakhupha emnyameni lethunzini elinzima waqamula amaketane abo.

ngoba uyawafohloza amasango ethusi ephule imigoqo yensimbi.
Abanye baba yiziwula ngenxa yezindlela zabo zokuhlamuka badliwa yizinhlupheko ngenxa yokuxhwala kwabo.

Abanye bawela olwandle ngemikhumbi; babengabathengisi emanzini abanzi.
Bayibona imisebenzi kaThixo, izenzo zakhe ezimangalisayo ekujuleni.

Kabambonge uThixo ngothando lwakhe olungaphuthiyo lezenzo zakhe ezimangalisayo ebantwini.
Kabamphakamise emhlanganweni wabantu bamdumise enkundleni yabadala.
Waguqula imifula yaba yinkangala, imithombo egelezayo yaba ngumhlabathi owomileyo,
lomhlabathi olezithelo waba lugwadule oluletshwayi, ngenxa yobubi balabo ababehlala khona.
Waguqula inkangala yaba ngamachibi amanzi lomhlabathi owomileyo waba yimithombo egelezayo;
lapho waletha abalambileyo ukuba bahlale khona, khonapho basungula umuzi ababezahlala kuwo.
Bahlanyela amasimu, bagxumeka amavini athela isivuno esikhulu;
wababusisa banda baba banengi kakhulu, akaze ayekela imihlambi yabo inciphe.
Kwasekusithi ubunengi babo sebunciphile, bathotshiswa ngokuncindezelwa, ngokuhlupheka langosizi;
kwathi yena othela ihlazo ezikhulwini wabantulisa egwaduleni olungakhanyi mzila.
Kodwa abaswelayo wabakhupha ekuhluphekeni kwabo wandisa izimuli zabo njengemihlambi yezimvu.
Abaqotho bayabona bathokoze, kodwa bonke ababi bagcike imilomo yabo.
Lowo ohlakaniphileyo, kaqaphele lezizinto anakane ngothando olukhulu lukaThixo.
Inhliziyo yami ibambelele, kayiguquki, Oh Nkulunkulu; ngizahlabela ngenze iculo elimnandi ngomoya wami wonke.
Vuka, mhubhe lechacho! Ngizayivusa intathakusa.
Ngizakudumisa, yebo Thixo, phakathi kwezizwe; ngizahlabela ngawe phakathi kwabantu.
Ngoba lukhulu uthando lwakho, luphakame kulamazulu; ukwethembeka kwakho kufinyelela emkhathini.
Kawuphakanyiswe, yebo Nkulunkulu, ngaphezu kwamazulu, akuthi inkazimulo yakho ibe khona emhlabeni wonke.
Sisindise usisize ngesandla sakho sokunene, ukuze kuthi laba obathandayo bakhululwe.
UNkulunkulu usekhulumile esendlini yakhe engcwele: “Ngokunqoba ngizayaba iShekhemu ngihlole leSigodi saseSukhothi.
Ngeyami iGiliyadi, loManase ngowami; u-Efrayimi yisivikelo sekhanda lami, uJuda uyintonga yami yobukhosi.
IMowabi ngumganu wami wokugezela, phezu kuka-Edomi ngiphosela amanyathelo ami; phezu kweFilistiya ngihalalisa umkhosi wokunqoba.”
Ngubani ozangisa emzini olenqaba na? Ngubani ozangiholela e-Edomi na?
Kakusuwe na, Oh Nkulunkulu, wena osusikhalele, ongasaphumi lathi ezimpini zethu?
Ake usisize ezitheni zethu, ngoba usizo lomuntu luyize.
Nxa siloNkulunkulu sizanqoba, njalo uzazinyathelela phansi izitha zethu.

Oh Nkulunkulu, wena engikudumisayo, ungali ulokhu uthule,
ngoba abantu ababi abalenkohliso bayivulile imilomo yabo bekhuluma ngami; bakhuluma bengigcona ngendimi zabo zamanga.
Bangihonqolozela ngamazwi enzondo; bayangisukela nje kungelasizatho.
Ukubathanda kwami bakuphindisela ngokungisola, kodwa ngingumuntu womkhuleko.
Bangiphindisela okuhle ngokubi, langenzondo ukubathanda kwami.
Bathi, “Khethani umuntu omubi ozamelana laye; ombeka icala kame kwesokunene sakhe.
Nxa esethonisiswa kafunyanwe elecala, futhi sengathi imikhuleko yakhe ingamlahla.
Sengathi insuku zakhe zingabazilutshwana; kakube lomunye ozathatha isikhundla sakhe sobukhokheli.
Sengathi abantwabakhe bangaba zintandane lomkakhe abe ngumfelokazi.
Sengathi abantwabakhe bangaba zinzulane zeziceli; sengathi bangaxotshwa emizini yabo esingamanxiwa.
Sengathi lowo aboleke kuye angamemuka konke alakho; sengathi labezizweni bangaphanga izithelo zamandla akhe.
Akungabikhona omenzela umusa loba ozwela izintandane zakhe.
Sengathi izizukulwane zakhe zingaphela, amabizo abo esulwe esizukulwaneni esilandelayo.
Sengathi ububi bukayise bungakhunjulwa phambi kukaThixo, sengathi isono sikanina singacitshi lanini.
Sengathi izono zabo zingahlala zisobala phambi kukaThixo, ukuze aphelise du ukukhunjulwa kwabo emhlabeni.
Ngoba kazange akhumbule ukwenza umusa kodwa wabazingelela ukufa abayanga labaswelayo labadabukileyo enhliziyweni.
Wayekuthanda ukwethesa isithuko, sengathi singehlela kuye. Wayengakuthandi ukubusisa sengathi kungaba khatshana laye.
Wayevunula ukuthuka njengesigqoko; kwangena emzimbeni wakhe njengamanzi, emathanjeni akhe njengamafutha.
Sengathi kungaba njengengubo athandelwe ngayo njengebhanti abotshwe ngalo lanini.”
Sengathi lokhu kungaba yisijeziso sikaThixo kulabo abangethesa amacala, labo abakhuluma okubi ngami.
Kodwa wena, Oh Thixo woBukhosi, ngenzela kuhle ngenxa yebizo lakho; ngenxa yokulunga kothando lwakho akungikhulule.
Ngoba ngingumyanga ngiyaswela, lenhliziyo yami ilimele ngaphakathi kwami.
Ngiyafiphala njengethunzi lakusihlwa; ngiyaphetshulwa njengentethe.
Amadolo ami asebuthakathaka ngokuzila ukudla; umzimba wami usuzacile usutshwabhene.
Sengiyinto yokuhlekisa kulabo abangibeka amacala; bathi bengibona banyikinye amakhanda abo.
Akungisize, Oh Thixo Nkulunkulu wami; ngisindisa ngokuya ngothando lwakho.
Kumele bakwazi ukuthi lokhu ngokwesandla sakho; wena, Oh Thixo, nguwe okwenzileyo.
Bangangiqalekisa, kodwa wena uzabusisa; bathi bayahlasela bayangiswe, kodwa inceku yakho izathokoza.
Abangivukelayo kabembeswe ihlazo bagoqelwe ngokuyangeka njengengubo.
Ngomlomo wami ngizambabaza kakhulu uThixo; ngisemphakathini ngizamdumisa.
Ngoba umi ngakwesokunene salowo oswelayo, ukusindisa impilo yakhe kulabo abamnikela ekufeni.
UThixo uthi enkosini yami: “Hlala ngakwesokunene sami ngize ngenze izitha zakho zibe yisinyathelo senyawo zakho.”
UThixo uzakwelula intonga yakhe elamandla eyobukhosi kusuka eZiyoni wena uzabusa phakathi kwezitha zakho
Amabutho akho azazinikela mhla uphuma impi. Wembethe ubukhosi obungcwele, phakathi komnyama wempondozankomo uzakwamukela amazolo obutsha bakho.
UThixo ufungile njalo kasoze ayiguqule ingqondo yakhe: “Wena ungumphristi kuze kube nini lanini emkhondweni kaMelikhizedekhi.”
INkosi ikwesokunene sakho; izawachoboza amakhosi mhla wosuku lokuthukuthela kwayo.
Izazahlulela izizwe, yenze inqwaba yabafileyo njalo ibachoboze ababusi bomhlaba wonke.
Izanatha emfuleni oseceleni kwendlela; ngakho-ke izaliphakamisa ikhanda layo.
Dumisani uThixo. Ngizambabaza uThixo ngenhliziyo yami yonke enkundleni yabaqotho lasemhlanganweni.
Mikhulu imisebenzi kaThixo; isemicabangweni yabo bonke abathokoza ngayo.
Zilenkazimulo lobukhosi izenzo zakhe, lokulunga Kwakhe kumi kuze kube laphakade.
Wenzile ukuthi izimanga zakhe zikhunjulwe; uThixo ulomusa lesihawu.
Uyabapha ukudla labo abamesabayo; uyasikhumbula isivumelwano Sakhe lanini.
Ubatshengisile abantu bakhe amandla emisebenzi yakhe, ngokubapha amazwe ezinye izizwe.
Imisebenzi yezandla zakhe ithembekile, ilungile; zonke iziqondiso zakhe ziyathembeka.
Zimi kaziguquki nini lanini, zenziwa ngeqiniso langobuqotho.
Wathumela abantu bakhe insindiso; wasingcwelisa isivumelwano Sakhe okwanininini lingcwele liyesabeka ibizo lakhe.
Ukumesaba uThixo kuyikuqala kwenhlakanipho bonke abalandela iziqondiso zakhe balokuzwisisa okuhle. Kungokwakhe ukudunyiswa kwaphakade.
Dumisani uThixo. Ubusisiwe umuntu owesaba uThixo, othokoza kakhulu ngemilayo yakhe.
Abantwabakhe bazaba lamandla elizweni; isizukulwane soqotho sizabusiswa.
Inotho lenzuzo kusendlini yakhe, lokulunga kwakhe kumi laphakade.
Lasebumnyameni kuyavela ukukhanya kwabaqotho, emuntwini olomusa, olesihawu lolungileyo.
Ubuhle buzakwehlela kuye ophanayo loweboleka ekhululekile, oqhuba zonke izinto zakhe ngemfanelo.
Ngeqiniso kayikunyikinyeka; umuntu olungileyo uzakhunjulwa lanininini.
Akayikwesaba imibiko emibi; inhliziyo yakhe ichumile, yethembele kuThixo.
Inhliziyo yakhe ikhululekile, akalakwesaba; ekucineni uzakhangela izitha zakhe ngokunqoba.
Uhlakazele izipho zakhe kubayanga ezindaweni zonke, ukulunga kwakhe kumi laphakade; uphondo lwakhe luzaphakanyiselwa phezulu ngenhlonipho.
Umuntu omubi uzakubona lokhu afuthelane, uzagedla amazinyo akhe, acikizeke emzimbeni; izinkanuko zababi zizaphetha ziyize.
Dumisani uThixo. Dumisani uThixo, lina zinceku zakhe, dumisani ibizo likaThixo.
Kalidunyiswe ibizo likaThixo, khona manje kanye laphakade.
Kusukela okuphuma khona ilanga kusiyafika lapho elitshona khona, kufanele lidunyiswe ibizo likaThixo.
UThixo uphakeme ngaphezu kwezizwe zonke, inkazimulo yakhe ngaphezulu kwamazulu.
Ngubani na onjengoThixo uNkulunkulu wethu, oNguye ohlezi ebukhosini phezulu,
okhothama akhangele phansi emazulwini lasemhlabeni?
Uyabavusa abampofu othulini, aphakamise abaswelayo esilotheni;
abahlalise lamakhosana, amakhosana abantu bakibo.
Lomfazi oyinyumba umenza ahlale kuhle emzini wakhe afane lalowo ongunina wabantwana. Dumisani uThixo.
Kwathi ekuphumeni kuka-Israyeli eGibhithe, indlu kaJakhobe isuka ebantwini bolimi lwezizweni,
uJuda waba yindlu engcwele kaNkulunkulu, u-Israyeli waba ngumbuso wakhe.
Ulwandle lwakubona lwabaleka, iJodani yabuyela emuva.
Izintaba zaqothuka njengenqama, amaqaqa enza njengamawundlu.
Kwakungani, we lwandle, wasuka wabaleka? Wena Jodani wabuyela emuva?
Lani zintaba laqolotsha njengenqama, lina maqaqa njengamawundlu?
Thuthumela, we mhlaba, phambi kukaThixo, phambi kukaNkulunkulu kaJakhobe,
owaphendula idwala laba lichibi, idwala eliqinileyo laba ngumthombo wamanzi.
Kakungabi kithi, Oh Thixo, hatshi kithi kodwa kwelakho ibizo kakube lenkazimulo, ngenxa yothando lokuthembeka Kwakho.
Kungani izizwe zisithi, “Ungaphi uNkulunkulu wabo na?”
UNkulunkulu wethu usezulwini; wenza loba yini ayithandayo.
Kodwa izithombe zabo yisiliva legolide, zenziwe ngezandla zabantu.
Zilemilomo, kodwa kazikhulumi, amehlo, kodwa kaziboni;
zilezindlebe, kodwa kazizwa, amakhala, kodwa kazinuki lutho;
zilezandla, kodwa kazenelisi ukuthinta, inyawo, kodwa kazihambi; njalo ngeke nje zenze umsindo ngemphimbo yazo.
Labo abazenzayo bazakuba njengazo, kube njalo lakulabo abathemba kuzo.
Oh ndlu ka-Israyeli, methembe uThixo lusizo lwabo lesihlangu sabo.
Oh, ndlu ka-Aroni, methembe uThixo ulusizo lwabo lesihlangu sabo.
Lina elimesabayo, thembani kuThixo ulusizo lwabo lesihlangu sabo.
UThixo uyasikhumbula njalo uzasibusisa: Uzayibusisa indlu ka-Israyeli, uzayibusisa indlu ka-Aroni,
uzababusisa labo abamesabayo uThixo abancinyane labakhulu ngokufananayo.
Sengathi uThixo angalenza lande, lonke lina kanye labantwana benu.
Sengathi lingabusiswa nguThixo uMenzi wezulu lomhlaba.
NgakaThixo amazulu aphezu kwakho konke, kodwa umhlaba wawunika abantu.
Kakusibo abafileyo abadumisa uThixo, labo abangena phansi ekuthuleni;
yithi esimbabazayo uThixo, khona manje kanye laphakade. Dumisani uThixo.
Ngiyamthanda uThixo ngoba walizwa ilizwi lami; wezwa ukukhala kwami ngicela umusa.
Ngoba wangipha indlela yakhe, ngizambiza kokuphela nxa ngisaphila.
Izibopho zokufa zangithandela, ubuhlungu obukhulu bengcwaba bangehlela; ngagajelwa yikuhlupheka losizi.
Ngasengibiza ibizo likaThixo : “Oh Thixo ake ungisindise!”
UThixo ulomusa njalo ulungile; uNkulunkulu wethu ulesihawu.
UThixo uvikela abalenhliziyo ethobekileyo; ngathi ngihluphekile kakhulu wangisindisa.
Phumula njalo, we mphefumulo wami, ngoba uThixo ukwenzile ukulunga.
Ngoba wena Thixo, uwukhulule umphefumulo wami ekufeni, amehlo ami ezinyembezini, lezinyawo zami azaze zakhubeka,
ukuze ngihambe phambi kukaThixo elizweni labaphilayo.
Ngathembela kuThixo; ngakho ngasengisithi, “Ngiyahlupheka kakhulu.”
Ngiphakathi kokulahla ithemba ngathi, “Bonke abantu balamanga.”
Ngingambonga ngani uThixo ngabo bonke ubuhle bakhe kimi?
Ngizayiphakamisa inkezo yensindiso ngimemeze ibizo likaThixo.
Ngizazigcwalisa izifungo zami kuThixo phambi kwabo bonke abantu bakhe.
Kuligugu emehlweni kaThixo ukufa kwabathembekileyo bakhe.
Oh Thixo, ngempela ngiyinceku Yakho, indodana yencekukazi yakho; usungikhulule emaketaneni ami.
Ngizakwenzela umhlatshelo womnikelo wokubonga ngilibize ibizo likaThixo
Ngizazigcwalisa izifungo zami kuThixo phambi kwabo bonke abantu bakhe,
emagumeni endlu kaThixo phakathi kwakho, wena Jerusalema. Dumisani uThixo.
Dumisani uThixo lina zizwe zonke; mbabazeni lina bantu lonke.
Ngoba lukhulu uthando lwakhe kithi, lokuthembeka kukaThixo kumi kuze kube phakade. Dumisani uThixo.
Mbongeni uThixo ngoba ulungile; uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
U-Israyeli katsho athi: “Uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.”
Kayithi indlu ka-Aroni: “Uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.”
Akuthi bonke abamesabayo uThixo bathi: “Uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.”
Ngathi ngidabukile ngakhala kuThixo, waphendula ngokungikhulula.
UThixo ulami, angiyikwesaba. Umuntu angenzani kimi na?
UThixo ulami; ungumsizi wami. Ngizazinyonkoloza ngegunya izitha zami.
Kungcono ukuphephela kuThixo kulokuthemba umuntu.
Kungcono ukuphephela kuThixo kulokuthemba amakhosana.
Zonke izizwe zangihanqa, kodwa ngegama likaThixo ngazichitha.
Zangihanqa inxa zonke kodwa ngegama likaThixo ngazichitha.
Zangiminyezela njengezinyosi kodwa zafa masinyane njengokungunguma komlilo wameva; ngebizo likaThixo ngazichitha.
Ngasunduzelwa emuva ngaphose ngawa, kodwa uThixo wangisiza.
UThixo ungamandla ami lengoma yami; yena useyikusindiswa kwami.
Imisindo yentokozo lokunqoba iphuma emathenteni abalungileyo: “Isandla sokunene sikaThixo senzile izinto ezinkulu!
Isandla sokunene sikaThixo siphakanyisiwe kakhulu; isandla sokunene sikaThixo senzile izinto ezinkulu!”
Angizukufa kodwa ngizaphila, ngizamemezela lokho akwenzileyo uThixo.
UThixo ungitshayile kakhulu, kodwa kanginikelanga ekufeni.
Ngivulela amasango okulunga; ngizangena ngimbonge uThixo.
Nanti isango likaThixo okungangena khona abalungileyo.
Ngizakubonga, ngoba ungiphendulile; usuyinsindiso yami.
Ilitshe ababelilahlile seliyilona ilitshe lekhoneni;
uThixo ukwenzile lokhu; njalo kuyamangalisa emehlweni ethu.
Leli lilanga alenzileyo uThixo; kasithokoze sijabule ngalo.
Oh Thixo, sisindise; Oh Thixo, siphumelelise.
Ubusisiwe lowo obuya ngebizo likaThixo. Siyakubusisa sisendlini kaThixo.
UThixo unguNkulunkulu, wenzile ukukhanya kwakhe kwehlela phezu kwethu. Liphethe izingatshana, ngenani edibini lomgido lize liyefika empondweni ze-alithare.
UnguNkulunkulu wami, ngizakubonga; unguNkulunkulu wami, ngizakuphakamisa.
Mbongeni uThixo ngoba ulungile; uthando lwakhe lumi kuze kube phakade.
Babusisiwe labo abandlela zabo zingelansolo, abahamba ngomthetho kaThixo.
Babusisiwe labo abagcina imilayo yakhe, abayidinga ngenhliziyo yabo yonke.
Kaboni lutho; bahamba ezindleleni zakhe.
Wena ubekile izimiso ukuthi zilandelwe ngokupheleleyo.
He, aluba izindlela zami zithembekile ekulaleleni izimemezelo zakho!
Lapho-ke ngeke ngibe lenhloni nxa ngikhumbula yonke imilayo yakho.
Ngizakudumisa ngenhliziyo eqotho ngilokhu ngiyifunda imithetho yakho elungileyo.
Ngizazilalela izimemezelo zakho; ungangikhalali ngempela.
Ijaha lingaphila njani impilo ehlambulukileyo? Ngokuphila ngendlela yelizwi lakho.
Ngikudinga ngenhliziyo yami yonke; ungangiyekeli ngiphambuke emilayweni yakho.
Ilizwi lakho ngilifihlile enhliziyweni yami ukuze ngingenzi isono kuwe.
Udumo kalube kuwe, Oh Thixo; ngifundisa izimemezelo zakho.
Ngezindebe zami ngiyayibala yonke imithetho ephuma emlonyeni wakho.
Kuyangithokozisa ukulandela izimiso zakho njengomuntu ethabela inotho enkulu.
Ngiyanakana ngezimiso zakho ngikhumbule ngezindlela zakho.
Ngiyathokoza ngezimemezelo zakho; angiyikulidela ilizwi lakho.
Yenzele okuhle inceku yakho ukuba ngiphile; ngizalilalela ilizwi lakho.
Vula amehlo ami ukuze ngibone izinto ezimangalisayo emthethweni wakho.
Ngiyisihambi emhlabeni; ungangifihleli imilayo yakho.
Umphefumulo wami uhugekile ngokulangazelela imithetho yakho ngezikhathi zonke.
Uyabakhuza abaklolodayo, abaqalekisiweyo abaphambukayo emithethweni yakho.
Susa kimi ihlazo lokweyisa, ngoba ngiyazigcina izimiso zakho.
Loba ababusi behlangana ngami bengigcona, inceku yakho izanakana ngezimemezelo zakho.
Izimiso zakho ziyinjabulo yami; zingabacebisi bami.
Ngehliselwe phansi othulini; londoloza impilo yami njengokwelizwi lakho.
Ngabalisa izindlela zami wangiphendula; ngifundisa izimiso zakho.
Ngenza ngizwisise imfundiso yezimiso zakho; lapho-ke ngizanakana ngezimanga zakho.
Umphefumulo wami ukhathele ngosizi; ngiqinisa njengokwelizwi lakho.
Ngivikela ezindleleni zenkohliso; woba lobubele kimi ngokomthetho wakho.
Ngikhethe indlela yeqiniso; sengibeke inhliziyo yami emithethweni yakho.
Ngibambelele ezimisweni zakho, Oh Thixo; ungangiyekeli ngiyangeka.
Ngigijima ngendlela yemithetho yakho, ngoba uyikhulule inhliziyo yami.
Ngifundisa, Oh Thixo; ukulandela izimemezelo zakho; ukuthi ngizigcine kuze kufike ekucineni.
Ngipha ukuzwisisa ukuze ngigcine umthetho wakho ngiwulalele ngayo yonke inhliziyo yami.
Ngiqondisa endleleni yemilayo yakho, ngoba khonapho ngifumana ukuthokoza.
Phendulela inhliziyo yami ezimisweni zakho kungabi ngokokuzizuzela okungokwami.
Phendula amehlo ami asuke ezintweni ezingesilutho; londoloza impilo yami njengokwelizwi lakho.
Gcwalisa isithembiso sakho encekwini yakho, ukuze wesatshwe.
Susa ihlazo engilesabayo, ngoba imithetho yakho ilungile.
Ngizilangazelela kanjani izimiso zakho! Londoloza impilo yami ekulungeni kwakho.
Sengathi uthando lwakho olungaphuthiyo lungeza kimi, Oh Thixo, insindiso yakho ize njengokuthembisa kwakho;
lapho-ke ngizamphendula lowo ongithukayo, ngoba ngithembe ilizwi lakho.
Ungangemuki emlonyeni ilizwi leqiniso, ngoba ithemba lami ngilibeke emithethweni yakho.
Ngizahlala ngiwulalela umthetho wakho, okwanini lanini.
Ngizazihambela ngikhululekile, ngoba ngiyidingisisile imithetho yakho.
Ngizakhuluma ngezimiso zakho phambi kwamakhosi ngingabi lamahloni,
ngoba ngithokoza ngisemilayweni yakho ngoba ngiyayithanda.
Ngizaphakamisa izandla zami emilayweni yakho engiyithandayo, nginakana ngezimemezelo zakho.
Khumbula ilizwi lakho encekwini yakho, ngoba usungiphe ithemba.
Induduzo yami phakathi kokuhlupheka kwami yile: Isithembiso sakho sigcina impilo yami.
Abaklolodayo bangihleka baze bakholise, kodwa kangiphambuki emthethweni wakho.
Ngiyayikhumbula imithetho yakho yekadeni, Oh Thixo, ngifumana ukududuzeka kuyo.
Ngithukuthela ngife ngenxa yababi, asebedele umthetho wakho.
Izimemezelo zakho ziyiyo injongo yengoma yami loba ngingabe ngihlala ngaphi
Ebusuku ngiyalikhumbula ibizo lakho, Oh Thixo, njalo ngizawugcina umthetho wakho.
Le yiyo injayelo yokwenza kwami: Ngiyayilalela imithetho yakho.
Uyingxenye yami, Oh Thixo, ngithembisile ukulalela amazwi akho.
Ngiyabudinga ubuso bakho ngenhliziyo yami yonke; woba lobubele kimi njengesithembiso sakho.
Sengizihlolile izindlela zami ngaphendula izinyathelo zami zaya ezimisweni zakho.
Ngizaphangisa ngingaphuzi ukulalela imilayo yakho.
Loba ababi bengangibopha ngentambo, angiyikuwukhohlwa umthetho wakho.
Phakathi kobusuku ngivukela ukukubonga ngemithetho yakho emihle.
Ngingumngane kubo bonke abakwesabayo, kubo bonke abalandela imithetho yakho.
Umhlaba ugcwele uthando lwakho, Oh Thixo; ngifundisa izimiso zakho.
Senzele okuhle isisebenzi sakho njengelizwi lakho, Oh Thixo.
Ngifundisa ulwazi lokwahlulela okufaneleyo, ngoba ngiyayikholwa imilayo yakho.
Ngingakabi sekuhluphekeni ngalahleka, kodwa manje sengilalela ilizwi lakho.
Ulungile njalo okwenzayo kulungile; ngifundisa izimiso zakho.
Lokuba abaklolodayo bengibhaceke ngamanga, ngiyazigcina izimiso zakho ngenhliziyo yami yonke.
Inhliziyo zabo zilolunya kazilazwelo, kodwa mina ngijabula ngomthetho wakho.
Kwakukuhle kimi ukuthi ngihlutshwe ukuze ngifunde izimiso zakho.
Umthetho ophuma emlonyeni wakho uligugu kimi okudlula inhlamvu zesiliva legolide eziyizinkulungwane.
Izandla zakho zangenza zangibumba, ngipha ukuzwisisa ukuze ngifunde imilayo yakho.
Sengathi labo abakwesabayo bangathokoza nxa bengibona, ngoba sengibeke ithemba lami elizwini lakho.
Ngiyazi, Thixo, ukuthi imithetho yakho ilungile, lokuthi ungihlukuluzile ngenxa yokuthembeka kwakho.
Sengathi uthando lwakho olungaphuthiyo lungaba yinduduzo kimi, njengesithembiso sakho encekwini yakho.
Isihawu sakho kasize kimi ukuze ngiphile, umthetho wakho uyikuthokoza kwami.
Sengathi abaklolodayo bangayangiswa ngokungigcona ngingonanga lutho; kodwa mina ngizanakana ngemithetho yakho.
Sengathi labo abakwesabayo bangaphendukela kimi, bona abezwisisa izimiso zakho.
Sengathi inhliziyo yami ingaba msulwa ngezimiso zakho, ukuze ngingayangiswa.
Umphefumulo wami uyacikizeka ngokulangazelela insindiso yakho, kodwa ngilibekile ithemba lami elizwini lakho.
Amehlo ami aseze efiphala ngokulinda isithembiso sakho; ngithi, “Uzaze ungiduduze nini na?”
Lanxa nginjengesixaxa sewayini esesikhumba sifuswe entuthwini, kangizilibali izimiso zakho.
Inceku yakho izalinda kuze kube nini na? Uzabajezisa nini abangihluphayo na?
Abaklolodayo bangigebhela amagodi, bephikisa umthetho wakho.
Yonke imilayo yakho ithembekile, ngisiza, ngoba abantu bayangichukuluza kungelasizatho.
Baphose bangesula emhlabeni, kodwa kangiyilahlanga imithetho yakho.
Ngivuselela ngomusa wakho olothando, ukuze ngigcine izimiso zomlomo wakho.
Ilizwi lakho, Oh Thixo, kalipheli lanini; limi liqinile emazulwini.
Ukuthembeka kwakho kukhona kuzozonke izizukulwane; wawumisa umhlaba, uzakuma kokuphela.
Imithetho yakho imi lanamhla lokhu, ngoba zonke izinto zikhonza wena.
Aluba umthetho wakho ubungesiyo injabulo yami ngabe ngabhubha ngiphakathi kokuhlupheka kwami.
Kangisoze ngafa ngayilibala imithetho yakho, ngoba ngayo uyilondolozile impilo yami.
Ngisindisa ngoba ngingowakho; ngiyidingisisile imithetho yakho.
Ababi balindele ukungichitha, kodwa ngizanakana ngezimiso zakho.
Kukho konke ukuphelela ngibona kulomkhawulo; kodwa imilayo yakho ayilamingcele.
Oh, ngiwuthanda kangakanani umthetho wakho! Ngikhumbula ngawo ilanga lonke.
Imilayo yakho iyangihlakaniphisa kulezitha zami, ngoba ngihlezi ngilayo.
Ngicacile ukuqedisisa kwami kulabafundisi bami, ngoba ngiyanakana ngezimiso zakho.
Ngiyezwisisa okudlula abadala, ngoba ngiyayilalela imithetho yakho.
Inyawo zami kaziyinyathelanga layiphi indlela embi ukuze ngilalele ilizwi lakho.
Kangiphambukanga emithethweni yakho, ngoba wena ngokwakho ungifundisile.
Amazwi akho anambitheka kamnandi kimi, amnandi kulenyosi emlonyeni wami!
Ngiyazuza ukuqedisisa emithethweni yakho; ngakho ngiyayizonda loba layiphi indlela engalunganga.
Ilizwi lakho liyisibane ezinyaweni zami liyikukhanya kwendlela yami.
Sengenzile isifungo ngasiqinisa, ukuthi ngizalandela imithetho yakho elungileyo.
Sengihlupheke kakhulu; londoloza impilo yami, Oh Thixo njengokutshiwo yilizwi lakho.
Yamukela, Oh Thixo, indumiso epheleleyo ngomlomo wami, ungifundise imithetho yakho.
Loba ngihlezi ngizibona sengingene engozini, kangiyi kuwulibala umthetho wakho.
Ababi sebengithiye ngomjibila kodwa kangiphambukanga emithethweni yakho.
Izimiso zakho ziyilifa lami laphakade; ziyintokozo yenhliziyo yami.
Inhliziyo yami izimisele ukugcina imilayo yakho kuze kube sekupheleni.
Ngiyabazonda abantu abangongqondombili, kodwa ngiyawuthanda umthetho wakho.
Uyisiphephelo sami lesihlangu sami; sengibeke ithemba lami elizwini lakho.
Sukani kimi lina benzi bobubi, ukuze ngikwazi ukugcina imilayo kaNkulunkulu wami!
Ngisekela njengesithembiso sakho ukuze ngiphile; ithemba lami lingaze labhidlika.
Ngiqinisa ukuze ngikhululwe; ngizahlala ngizinanza izimiso zakho.
Uyabalahla bonke labo abaphambuka ezimisweni zakho, ngoba ukukhohlisa kwabo kuyize.
Bonke ababi bomhlaba uyabalahlela kude njengezibi; ngakho ngiyazithanda izimiso zakho.
Inyama yami iyathuthumela ngokukwesaba; ngizwa ngiyesaba imithetho yakho.
Ngenzile okulungileyo lokufaneleyo; ungangiyekeleli abancindezeli bami.
Qinisa impilakahle yenceku yakho; ungayekeli abaklolodayo bangincindezele.
Amehlo ami asefiphala elokhu ekhangele insindiso yakho, ekhangele isithembiso sakho esilungileyo.
Yenza encekwini yakho ngokothando lwakho, ungifundise izimiso zakho.
Ngiyinceku yakho; ngipha ukuqedisisa ukuthi ngizwisise izimiso zakho.
Sekuyisikhathi sakho sokuthi wenze okwakho, Oh Thixo umthetho wakho uyephulwa nje.
Ngoba ngiyayithanda imilayo yakho kulegolide, kulegolide elicengekileyo,
njalo njengoba ngisithi imithetho yakho ilungile, ngiyayizonda yonke indlela engaqondanga.
Izimiso zakho ziyamangalisa; ngakho ngiyazilalela.
Ukwambulwa kwamazwi akho kuletha ukukhanya; kunika ukuzwisisa kwabayizithutha.
Ngivula umlomo wami ngikhefuzele, ngilangazelela imilayo yakho.
Phendukela kimi ube lomusa kimi, njengoba uhlezi ukwenza kwabathanda ibizo lakho.
Qondisa izinyathelo zami ngokwelizwi lakho; kakungabi lesono esingibusayo.
Ngihlenga ekuncindezelweni ngabantu, ukuze ngilalele imithetho yakho.
Yenza ubuso bakho bukhanye encekwini yakho, ungifundise izimiso zakho.
Imifula yezinyembezi iyajuluka emehlweni ami, ngoba umthetho wakho kawulalelwa.
Ulungile wena Thixo, lemithetho yakho ilungile.
Izimiso ozibekileyo zilungile; zithembekile ngokupheleleyo.
Ukutshiseka kwami kuyangicoba, ngoba izitha zami kaziwananzi amazwi akho.
Izithembiso zakho zihlolisisiwe kakhulu, inceku yakho iyazithanda.
Loba ngingumuntukazana ngiseyiswa, angiyikhohlwa imithetho yakho.
Ukulunga kwakho kumi laphakade njalo umthetho wakho uliqiniso.
Uhlupho losizi kuyakungehlele, kodwa imilayo yakho iyikuthokoza kwami.
Izimiso zakho zihlezi zilungile; ngipha ukuzwisisa ukuze ngiphile.
Ngiyamemeza ngayo yonke inhliziyo yami; ngiphendula, Thixo, mina ngizalalela imithetho yakho.
Ngiyakubiza, ngisindisa mina ngizagcina izimiso zakho.
Ngivuka emathathakusa ngikhale kuwe ngicela usizo; sengibeke ithemba lami elizwini lakho.
Amehlo ami alala ekhangele ngemilindo yonke yobusuku, ukuze ngicabange ngezithembiso zakho.
Zwana ilizwi lami ngokuya kothando lwakho; londoloza impilo yami, Oh Thixo ngokuya kwemithetho yakho.
Labo abakha amasu amabi baseduze, kodwa bakhatshana lomthetho wakho.
Ikanti useduze, wena Thixo, lemilayo yakho yonke iqinisile.
Sekukade ngafunda ezimisweni zakho ukuthi wazenzela ukuthi zime lanininini.
Khangela ukuhawula kwami ungikhulule, ngoba kangiwukhohlwanga umthetho wakho.
Ake ungimele ukuze ungihlenge; londoloza impilo yami njengesithembiso sakho.
Insindiso ikhatshana kwababi, ngoba kabazidingi izimiso zakho.
Isihawu sakho sikhulu, Oh Thixo londoloza impilo yami mayelana lemithetho yakho.
Zinengi izitha ezingihluphayo, kodwa kangiphambukanga ezimisweni zakho.
Ngikhangela abangakholwayo ngibenyanye, ngoba kabalilaleli ilizwi lakho.
Ake ubone ukuthi ngiyithanda kanganani imithetho yakho; londoloza impilo yami, Oh Thixo, ngokothando lwakho.
Wonke amazwi akho aqinisile; yonke imithetho yakho elungileyo ngeyaphakade.
Ababusi bayangihlupha kungelasizatho, kodwa inhliziyo yami iyaliqhuqhela ilizwi lakho.
Isithembiso sakho siyangithokozisa ingathi ngumuntu othole impango enkulu.
Amanga ngiyawazonda njalo ngiyawenyanya kodwa umthetho wakho ngiyawuthanda.
Ngikudumisa kasikhombisa ngelanga ngenxa yemithetho yakho elungileyo.
Kukhulu ukuthula abalakho labo abathanda umthetho wakho, kakulalutho olungabakhubekisa.
Ngiyilindele insindiso yakho, Oh Thixo njalo ngiyayilandela imilayo yakho.
Ngiyazilalela izimiso zakho, ngoba ngiyazithanda kakhulu.
Ngiyayilalela imithetho yakho lezimiso zakho, ngoba uyazazi zonke izindlela zami.
Sengathi ukukhala kwami kungafika kuwe, Oh Thixo ngipha ukuzwisisa njengelizwi lakho.
Sengathi ukuncenga kwami kungafika kuwe; ngikhulula njengesithembiso sakho.
Sengathi indebe zami zingageleza indumiso yakho, ngoba uyangifundisa imithetho yakho.
Sengathi ulimi lwami lungalihlabela ilizwi lakho, ngoba yonke imilayo yakho ilungile.
Sengathi isandla sakho singalungela ukungisiza, ngoba sengikhethe imithetho yakho.
Ngilangazelela insindiso yakho, Oh Thixo ngoba umthetho wakho uyinjabulo yami.
Kangiphile ukuze ngikudumise, sengathi njalo lemithetho yakho ingangisekela.
Ngiphambukile njengemvu elahlekileyo. Yidinge inceku yakho, ngoba kangikayikhohlwa imilayo yakho.
Ngiyambiza uThixo ngisosizini, laye angiphendule.
Ngisindisa, Oh Thixo, ezindebeni zamanga lezindimini zenkohliso.
Uzakwenzani kuwe, aphinde enzeni njalo, wena limi lwenkohliso?
Uzakujezisa ngomtshoko obukhali owebutho, ngamalahle avuthayo esihlahla.
Maye mina ngokuhlala kwami eMesheki, ngokuthi ngihlala emathenteni aseKhedari!
Sengihlale isikhathi eside kakhulu phakathi kwalabo abazonda ukuthula.
Ngingumuntu wokuthula; kodwa ngithi ngingakhuluma, sebefuna impi.
Ngiphakamisela amehlo ami ezintabeni usizo lwami luvela ngaphi na?
Usizo lwami luvela kuThixo, uMenzi wezulu lomhlaba.
Kayikuyekela unyawo lwakho lutshelela yena okulindayo kayikuwozela;
ngempela yena olinda u-Israyeli akayikuwozela, akayikulala.
UThixo uyakulinda uThixo ungumthunzi wakho esandleni sakho sokunene;
ilanga kaliyikukutshisa emini noma loba inyanga ebusuku.
UThixo uzakuvikela kuzozonke izingozi uzalinda impilo yakho;
uThixo uzalondoloza ukufika kwakho lokusuka kwakho manje kuze kube phakade.
Ngathokoza lalabo abathi kimi, “Kasiye endlini kaThixo.”
Inyawo zethu zimi ngaphakathi kwamasango akho, wena Jerusalema.
IJerusalema yakhiwe njengomuzi obambeneyo waqina.
Kulapho eziqansela khona izizwana, izizwana zikaThixo, ukudumisa ibizo likaThixo njengalokho okwamiselwa u-Israyeli, ukuba abonge ibizo likaThixo.
Kulapho okumi khona izihlalo zobukhosi ezokwahlulela, izihlalo zobukhosi ezendlu kaDavida.
Khulekelani ukuthula kwaseJerusalema: “Sengathi labo abakuthandayo bangaphepha.
Sengathi kungaba lokuthula ngaphakathi kwemiduli yakho lokuvikela ngaphakathi kwezinqaba zakho.”
Ngenxa yabafowethu labangane bami, ngizakuthi, “Ukuthula akube ngaphakathi kwakho.”
Ngenxa yendlu kaThixo uNkulunkulu wethu, ngizakhuthaza ukuphumelela kwakho.
Ngiphakamisela amehlo ami kuwe, wena osesihlalweni sobukhosi emazulwini!
Njengalokhu amehlo ezisebenzi ekhangela isandla somqatshi wazo, lanjengoba amehlo encekukazi ekhangela isandla senkosikazi yayo, kanjalo amehlo ethu akhangela kuThixo uNkulunkulu wethu, aze abe lomusa kithi.
Woba lomusa kithi, Oh Thixo, woba lomusa kithi, ngoba sesidiniwe yikweyiswa.
Sesibhensele ukuhozwa okunengi ngabazigqajayo, ukweyiswa yilabo abaklolodayo.
Aluba uThixo ubengemanga lathi yekela u-Israyeli atsho njalo,
aluba uThixo ubengemanga lathi, lapho sasihlaselwa ngabantu,
lapho ulaka lwabo lwalutshisa ngathi ngabe basiginya siphila;
ngabe izikhukhula zasigalulisa, umsinga wawuzasikhukhula,
amanzi ayabulayo ayezasikhucula.
Udumo kalube kuThixo ongasiyekelanga sadlithizwa ngamazinyo abo.
Siphunyukile njengenyoni emjibileni womthiyi; umjibila uqamukile sahle saphunyuka.
Usizo lwethu lusegameni likaThixo uMenzi wezulu lomhlaba.
Labo abamethembayo uThixo banjengentaba iZiyoni, yona enganyikinyekiyo, emi kuze kube laphakade.
Njengezintaba ezigombolozele iJerusalema, ngokunjalo uThixo uzungeza abantu bakhe manje kuze kube laphakade.
Intonga yobukhosi eyababi kayiyikusala ezweni elabelwe abalungileyo, ngoba abalungileyo bangaqabuka sebesebenzisa izandla zabo ukwenza okubi.
Yenza okuhle, awu Thixo, kulabo abalungileyo, kulabo abaqotho enhliziyweni
kodwa labo abaphambukela ezindleleni ezitshekileyo uThixo uzabaxotsha kanye labenzi bobubi. Ukuthula kakube ku-Israyeli.
Kwathi lapho uThixo ebuyisa izithunjwa eZiyoni, sasinjengabantu abaphuphayo.
Imilomo yethu yayigcwele ngohleko, lezindimi zethu zicula izingoma zentokozo. Basebesithi abezizwe, “UThixo ubenzele izinto ezimangalisayo.”
UThixo usenzele izinto ezimangalisayo, ngakho siyathokoza kakhulu.
Buyisa ukuphumelela kwethu, Oh Thixo, njengemifula eseNegebi.
Labo abahlanyela ngezinyembezi bazavuna ngezingoma zentokozo.
Lowo ophuma ekhala, ethwele inhlanyelo ukuba ayehlanyela uzabuya ngezingoma zentokozo, ethwele izinyanda.
Ngaphandle kokuba uThixo ayakhe indlu, abakhi bayo basebenzela ize. Ngaphandle kokuba uThixo awulinde umuzi, abalindi bawo balinda ize.
Kuyize ukuvuka kwenu ngovivi liphinde libambe kuze kuhlwe, lisebenzela ukudla kokufaka emlonyeni ngoba upha ubuthongo kulabo abathandayo.
Amadodana ayilifa elivela kuThixo, abantwana bangumvuzo ovela kuye.
Njengemitshoko esandleni sebutho anjalo amadodana azelwe ngumuntu esesemutsha.
Ubusisiwe umuntu omxhaka wakhe ugcwele wona. Kayikuyangeka nxa sebedibana lezitha entubeni.
Babusisiwe bonke abamesabayo uThixo, abahamba ngezindlela zakhe.
Lizakudla izithelo zomsebenzi wenu; izibusiso lokuphumelela kuzakuba ngokwenu.
Umkakho wesifazane uzakuba njengevini elithela kakhulu phakathi kwendlu yakho; amadodana akho azakuba njengamahlumela e-oliva esetafuleni yakho.
Ibusisiwe kanjalo indoda eyesaba uThixo.
Sengathi uThixo angakubusisa eseZiyoni insuku zonke zokuphila kwakho; sengathi ungakubona ukuphumelela kweJerusalema,
njalo sengathi ungaphila uze ubone isizukulwane sakho. Ukuthula kakube ku-Israyeli.
Sebengihluphe kakhulu kusukela ebutsheni bami katsho njalo u-Israyeli,
sebengihluphe kakhulu kusukela ebutsheni bami, kodwa kabangehlulanga.
Abalimi bawulimile umhlane wami benza imifolo emide.
Kodwa uThixo ulungile; ungikhulule ezintanjeni zababi.
Akuthi bonke abayizondayo iZiyoni babuyiselwe emuva beyangekile.
Sengathi bangaba njengotshani obukhula ephahleni obubuna bungakakhuli;
umvuni angeke agcwalisa isandla sakhe ngabo, loba lowo obuthayo agcwalise izingalo zakhe.
Sengathi labo abadlulayo bangabokuthi, “Izibusiso zikaThixo mazibe kuwe; siyakubusisa ngegama likaThixo.”
Ngingaphansi ekujuleni ngiyakhala kuwe, Thixo;
Thixo, zwana ilizwi lami. Indlebe zakho kazilalele ukukhala kwami ngicela umusa.
Aluba wena, Thixo ububhala phansi zonke izono, ngubani ongema na Nkosi?
Kodwa kuwe kulentethelelo; ngalokho uyesatshwa.
Ngiyamlindela uThixo, umphefumulo wami uyalinda, ngibeka ithemba lami elizwini lakho.
Umphefumulo wami ulindela uThixo okudlula abalindi bemelele ukusa, okudlula abalindi bemelele ukusa.
We Israyeli, beka ithemba lakho kuThixo, ngoba kuye uThixo kulothando olungaphuthiyo njalo kuye kulensindiso epheleleyo.
Yena ngokwakhe uzahlenga u-Israyeli kuzozonke izono zabo.
Inhliziyo yami kayizikhukhumezi, Oh Thixo, amehlo ami kawaziphakamisi; kangizihluphi ngezindaba ezinkulu loba ngezinto ezimangalisayo kimi.
Kodwa ngiwupholisile ngawuthulisa umphefumulo wami; njengomntwana okhutshwe ebeleni likanina, njengomntwana okhutshwe ebeleni unjalo umphefumulo wami uthule ngaphakathi kwami.
Oh, Israyeli, beka ithemba lakho kuThixo manje kuze kube phakade.
Oh Thixo, khumbula uDavida ngezinhlupheko zonke azibhenselayo.
Wafunga isifungo kuThixo wenza isithembiso kuMninimandla kaJakhobe:
“Angizukungena endlini yami loba ngiye embhedeni wami,
angiyikuwavumela amehlo ami ubuthongo, akukuba lakuwozela enkopheni zami,
ngize ngifumane indawo kaThixo, indawo yokuhlala uMninimandla kaJakhobe.”
Sakuzwa lokhu e-Efrathi, sakubona emangweni waseJayari:
“Kasiye lapho ahlala khona; kasikhonze phansi kwesihlalo sakhe.
Phakama, Oh Thixo, ubuye endaweni yakho yokuphumula, wena umtshokotsho wesivumelwano elitshengisa amandla akho.
Sengathi abaphristi bakho bangembeswa ngokulunga; sengathi labathembekileyo bakho bangahlabelela ngentokozo.”
Ngenxa yenceku yakho uDavida, ungamfulatheli ogcotshiweyo wakho.
UThixo wenza isifungo kuDavida, isifungo esiqinileyo angakusaphula wathi: “Omunye wezizukulwane zakho ngizambeka esihlalweni sakho sobukhosi
aluba amadodana akho egcina isivumelwano sami lezimiso engibafundisa zona, lapho-ke amadodana abo azahlala esihlalweni sakho sobukhosi kuze kube nini lanini.”
Ngoba uThixo uyikhethile iZiyoni, uyithandile ukuba yindawo yakhe yokuhlala:
“Le yindawo yami yokuphumula lanini; lapha ngizahlala ngisebukhosini, ngoba ngiyithandile
ngizayibusisa ngokudla okunengi; abayanga bayo ngizabasuthisa ngokudla.
Ngizavunulisa abaphristi bayo ngensindiso, labathembekileyo bakhe bazahlabelela ngentokozo nini lanini.
Lapha ngizakhulisa uphondo lukaDavida ngilungisele ogcotshiweyo wami isibane.
Ngizakwembathisa izitha ngehlazo, kodwa umqhele osekhanda lakhe uzakhazimula.”
Bheka kuhle, kuyabukeka kangakanani nxa abazalwane behlezi ndawonye ngokuzwana!
Kunjengamafutha aligugu athelwe ekhanda, ejuluka endevini, ejuluka endevini zika-Aroni, ehlele emabheqeni ezigqoko zakhe.
Kufana lokuthi amazolo aseHemoni akhithikela eNtabeni iZiyoni. Ngoba lapho uThixo wehlisela isibusiso sakhe, esiyikuphila okwaphakade.
Dumisani uThixo, lonke lina zinceku zikaThixo eliqhuba inkonzo endlini kaThixo ebusuku.
Phakamisani izandla zenu endlini engcwele lidumise uThixo.
Sengathi uThixo, uMenzi wezulu lomhlaba, angalibusisa eseZiyoni.
Dumisani uThixo. Dumisani ibizo likaThixo; mdumiseni lina zinceku zikaThixo,
lina eliqhuba inkonzo endlini kaThixo, emagumeni endlu kaNkulunkulu.
Dumisani uThixo ngoba uThixo ulungile; hlabelani indumiso ebizweni lakhe ngoba lokho kuhle.
Ngoba uThixo usemkhethile uJakhobe ukuba ngowakhe, u-Israyeli ukuba yinotho yakhe eligugu.
Ngiyazi ukuthi uThixo mkhulu, lokuthi iNkosi yethu inkulu kulabonkulunkulu bonke.
UThixo wenza loba yini ayifunayo, emazulwini lasemhlabeni, enlwandle lasezinzikini zazo.
Wenza amayezi aqubuka emikhawulweni yomhlaba; uthuma umbane kanye lezulu, avulele umoya oseziphaleni zakhe.
Wawalahla phansi amazibulo aseGibhithe, amazibulo abantu lawezinyamazana.
Wathumela izibonakaliso lezimangaliso zakhe phakathi kwakho, wena Gibhithe, phezu kukaFaro lezinceku zakhe zonke.
Wazilahla phansi izizwe ezinengi wabulala amakhosi alamandla,
uSihoni inkosi yama-Amori, u-Ogi inkosi yaseBhashani lawo wonke amakhosi aseKhenani
wanika ilizwe labo laba yilifa, ilifa labantu bakhe, u-Israyeli.
Ibizo lakho, Oh Thixo, limi kuze kube nininini, udumo lwakho, Oh Thixo, ezizukulwaneni zonke.
Ngoba uThixo uzabalamulela abantu bakhe abe lesihawu ezincekwini zakhe.
Izithombe zezizwe ziyisiliva legolide, zenziwe ngezandla zabantu.
Zilemilomo, kodwa kazikhulumi, amehlo, kodwa kaziboni;
zilezindlebe, kodwa kazizwa, njalo kazilamphefumulo emilonyeni yazo.
Labo abazenzayo bazakuba njengazo, kube njalo lakulabo abathemba kuzo.
Wena ndlu ka-Israyeli, dumisa uThixo; wena ndlu ka-Aroni, dumisa uThixo;
wena ndlu kaLevi, dumisa uThixo lina elimesabayo, dumisani uThixo.
Udumo alube uThixo lusuka eZiyoni, kuye ohlala eJerusalema. Dumisani uThixo.
Bongani uThixo, ngoba ulungile. Uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Bongani uNkulunkulu wabonkulunkulu. Uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Bongani uMbusi wababusi: Uthando lwakhe lumi kuze kube laphakade.
Kuye yedwa owenza izimanga ezinkulu, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Owathi ngokuzwisisa kwakhe wenza amazulu, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Owendlala umhlaba phezu kwamanzi, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Owenza izibane ezinkulu, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Ilanga ukubusa emini, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Inyanga lezinkanyezi ukubusa ebusuku, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Kuye owatshaya walalisa amazibulo aseGibhithe, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Wakhupha u-Israyeli phakathi kwabo, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Ngesandla esilamandla lengalo eyeluliweyo, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Kuye owadabula uLwandle oluBomvu lwehlukana, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Wakhuphula u-Israyeli phakathi kwalo, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Kodwa wakhukhulela uFaro lempi yakhe eLwandle oluBomvu, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Wahola abantu bakhe enkangala, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Owalahla phansi amakhosi amakhulu, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Wabulala amakhosi esabekayo, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade,
uSihoni inkosi yama-Amori, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade,
lo-Ogi inkosi yaseBhashani, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Wanikela amazwe abo njengelifa, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Abayilifa encekwini yakhe u-Israyeli, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Kuye Yedwa owasikhumbula singesibantu balutho, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Wasikhulula ezitheni zethu, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Njalo onika ukudla izidalwa zonke, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Bongani uNkulunkulu wasezulwini, uthando lwakhe lumi laphakade.
Ngasemifuleni yaseBhabhiloni sahlala phansi sakhala lapho sasikhumbula iZiyoni.
Khona lapho ezihlahleni zemidubu saphanyeka amachacho ethu,
ngoba khonapho abathumbi bethu bacela izingoma kithi, labahlukuluzi bethu bafuna izingoma zentokozo; bathi, “Sihlabeleleni enye yezingoma zaseZiyoni!”
Singazihlabela kanjani izingoma zikaThixo siselizweni lemzini na?
Aluba ngikukhohlwa, Oh Jerusalema, isandla sami sokunene kasilahlekelwe yibungcitshi baso.
Sengathi ulimi lwami lunganamathela elwangeni lomlomo wami uba ngingakukhumbuli wena, uba ngingathathi iJerusalema njengentokozo yami ephezu konke.
Khumbula, Oh Thixo, ama-Edomi akwenzayo mhla iJerusalema ithunjwa. “Lidilizeni,” baklabalala, “lidilizeni kanye lezisekelo zalo!”
Wena Ndodakazi yaseBhabhiloni, oqunyelwe ukubhubha, ubusisiwe lowo okuphindiselayo ngalokho okwenzileyo kithi.
Ubusisiwe lowo othatha insane zakho, azisakazele ematsheni.
